lines.line: ...Alright. Time to go. I'll wait for them, I guess.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Ouch!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Sorry about all the trouble I caused... I hope this makes it up to you.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: ...Alright. Time to go.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh, there you are! I felt sad leaving you behind!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Say, if you need a lift, just tell me.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright then, buckle up!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, I'm dropping you off! Stick the landing!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I can't believe it! It's working! Look! Look at it!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: A Growth Accelerator... Can you imagine the possibilities?!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: We'll be able to... I don't know, help the poor, that's nice, right?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: But we're not done. Well, I'm not done. I'd still like your help.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Look, let's try it out together, alright? Maybe I'll let you go afterwards?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll join you outside. Once I'm sure this works, I'll be able to... Show it to them.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: In theory, it should be easy to operate... I'm trusting you. Again. Sorry 'bout that.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, it's just on the hill next to us, but I can bring you there if ya want!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Just don't get too used to me, alright? Tell me when you're ready.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Here we go!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll do a quick rundown of how to operate this. It's not automatic yet.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll give you a remote. You'll simply have to click in the right orders. You'll see!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You have to be quick, though! You can't just take all the time you want.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I have no clue how stable all of this is, so we'll start slowly!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I know this sounds a li'l scary, but you've shown yourself being capable.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Tell me when you're ready, I'll give you the remote then start the machine!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Ready? Take this first.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Think of it like... Casting one of your spells. You're used to that, right?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Let's start slowly! You have 45 seconds to fully charge it up!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Halfway there!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: And now, we observe!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh my... I- No way...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Do you have ANY idea what it is we've just done?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I have to show that to the Chief. They WILL accept me! I cannot fail now!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Tell you what, let's meet up at the Chief's hut. If you want me to take you there right now, you can just go ahead and tell me!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, let's fly!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It really is convenient being with me, huh?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: On second thought... Isn't it too soon?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I-I think I want to turn back... I...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Gah! If I can't get myself to do it now, I'll never do it!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You should approach the Chief first. It... won't work if I do it. I'll come by afterwards.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Ah, human! Welcome back. Good timing...

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Did you happen to see... An oddly dressed Avo around here recently?

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: We kicked that girl from the tribe, and we do have our reasons.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: I've heard reports of her snooping around recently. With a human, even.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: And I believe... That this is no coincidence you're here.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: I will be frank. You're with her, aren't you? I won't hurt you. I won't hurt her either.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: She's not exactly welcome here. But she's never told you about that, did she?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: And I have nothing to hide, Chief.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: STOP IT, you two! Let her talk!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You're all scared of change, and that's all there is to it. Now...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: May I... Show you something?

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Hmpf. Let's see that broken atrocity of yours.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: ...It's time. Talk to me.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: This is it. I can't fail now... I really hope I can trust you.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You have no idea how important this is to me.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It'll be slightly more difficult than last time, so get ready.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll give you the remote once you're ready!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: I truly hope this will work, for once.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Wait, are you sure this isn't dang-

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Don't worry 'bout that!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Let's do this!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Here we go!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh god, no- Let me boot up the machine again...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright... Talk to me.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Let's just say... Failure is part of the process?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I-You-no, I can't blame anyone. Let's just do this again.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Hm. I was almost hopeful this time.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: T-talk to me once you're ready to try again.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: C-Chief, we... we got this, don't worry!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: 't would've been too good to be false, right?

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: ...Was anything supposed to happen?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Just... Get ready.

lines.speaker: Avos Guard
lines.line: That's it, I-

lines.speaker: Avos Chief
lines.line: Let's just give her a chance for now.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Hmm... Interesting...

lines.speaker: Avos Guard
lines.line: Why is she getting away with using such magic?!

lines.speaker: Avos Guard
lines.line: Tch. How horrible...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh I'm gonna charge this sapling like crazy!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, this is the last stretch!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: One last time soldier, and I'm counting on you to be quick!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Stand back... Almost there!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: ...Oh my!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Wait... That's it?? No, this isn't right...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Let me just...

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: WAIT!

lines.speaker: Avos Guard
lines.line: Chief! Have you seen what she just did?!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I-I didn't mean to! I told you to stand back!!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Under normal circumstances, I'd have sent you down the pit after cutting off your feathers.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: But these are not normal circumstances. Soldier, may you come over here as well?

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: So you fused OUR magic... With electromagic?

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: I recognized extracts from the totem too. You're the one who stole from us, right?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I... might have done that.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: And on top of that, you used the Wynn warrior to fool us?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: And I'm sure you know why I did!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Do you have any idea how unstable this wretched electromagic is?!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I-I can control it!!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: And you should NOT! Don't you understand? This is too dangerous!

lines.speaker: Avos Guard
lines.line: Should we kill her on the spot?! We almost died!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: No, don't kill her. I want her and the soldier in my hut, now.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Ava. You can't keep going with this. Just stop. This is your final warning.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: What do you even hope to accomplish? You used to be such a brilliant kid.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I just... wanna help people. You know that, I'm sure you understand!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Have you seen the Factory? They tried to help people, and instead they killed hundreds!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Do you think you're able change the world?! Well, you can't, Ava! This is beyond you!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: So, for the last time. Stop all of this. I might reconsider your banishment then.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You... You're really serious about that, huh? You'll NEVER change, will you?!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Do you guys have ANY idea how archaic you all are?! A ''final warning''??

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: To hell with this! I'll show everyone! I'll show how great we could be! You'll see, chief!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: I can't believe you worked with her, soldier. Well, now you know to avoid her.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: ...It appears she left some device on the floor. You might as well take them, I sure don't want it. And here, take these. We haven't had the chance to thank you regarding the Factory.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, don't run  off just like that!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, this should be good. Talk to me and I'll explain!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh, you're back! Talk to me so we can get started!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh no, time's up! It was supposed to be easy... Hold on, I'm booting it up again.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, it happens to the best of us!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It's fine, the machine isn't at full power, it won't explode or anything.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Just tell me when you're ready!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I have faith in you

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: We'll, uh, act as if nothing happened.

lines.speaker: Avos Chief
lines.line: Hey, would you listen to me?

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Is that another broken machine?

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Just show me what you're interested about.

lines.speaker: Gardener
lines.line: An audience? Oh, you're one of those, I see...

lines.speaker: Gardener
lines.line: ...Huh? An audience? Are you crazy?

lines.speaker: Weaponsmith
lines.line: Oh, are you interested in getting an audience too?!

lines.speaker: Corkus Citizen
lines.line: Oh, please don't mention the word "audience" to me!

lines.speaker: Corkus Citizen
lines.line: Why hello there you two! Whaddya want? An audience, huh? Eheh...

lines.speaker: Corkus Citizen
lines.line: Why thank you! 't was a pleasure doing business with you keheh... Good luck!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: ...Wait, who are YOU?
OUT!

lines.speaker: Corkus Citizen
lines.line: You're the WORST!!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Wow. I cannot stop staring at you... Such magnificent armour.

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Well, you two seem very lucky, there's an available slot soon!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: And just WHO are you two busting here like that?

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Do you have ANYTHING to show? Shouldn't you be working at that time?!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Not ANOTHER word! I've heard enough! You two clearly don't have anything worth my time!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Go back to your minimum wage job or something, but stay OUT of my room.

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Why hello there! Greetings! Welcome! You are looking splendid, dear!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Don't be sillydear, you're beautiful! Say, you're looking to be an investor, am I right?

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Why of course! Is that other person your assistant? Great!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: I'd like you to show me you have what it takes to be a great investor, yes!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Just hand over a mere 12 Liquified Emeralds and it's settled!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: And just WHO are you two, busting here like that?

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Do you have ANYTHING to show? I need more than fancy clothes.

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: And what's up with your face, lady? I'd look into that if I were you! OUT!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Oh god, not another duo. What do you want?!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: And what would a mechanic have for- Wait, is that an invitation letter..?

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: That's... Unprecedented. Let me check when the council's available and book an audience...

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: You two are extremely lucky. I can barely believe it.

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: I hope tomorrow morning is good for you, because the Council's somehow available at that time.

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Sounds good? Hopefully it does, because you don't really have much of a choice. Well, you can leave now.

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Oh! Why hello there you two! How may I be of assistance?

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: You're looking splendid dear! Now, are you-- Wait, you have a letter?

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: You know miss, you look like you could've been a great investor. Oh well, good luck!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Why sure darling, you have 3 seconds to- Hold on, that letter...

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: That's... Unprecedented. Let me check when the council's avaliable and book an audience...

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: I hope tomorrow morning is good for you.

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Don't miss it. Oh, and miss, there's something really off about your face.

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: If you want a tip, well... There's a new guy in the council, so he might be easier to impress!

lines.speaker: Receptionist
lines.line: Urgh, what now? You better be quick.

lines.speaker: Grant
lines.line: Hmpf. Is he late?

lines.speaker: Mei
lines.line: Nah, I saw him running around earlier. He's coming.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: My guts are telling me this one's gonna be impressive. I hope he's there.

lines.speaker: Clomius
lines.line: Oh, I hear him.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Sharp ear.

lines.speaker: Clomius
lines.line: Always.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Sorry, sorry, I'm here! Am I late?!

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: We haven't started yet. You're fine.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Phew, I tho- Wait, soldier??

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: You know them?! How?!

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: Of course you'd know them. I'm not surprised.

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: And lo and behold, you know them. Of course.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: How do you not?! They're the one who helped deal with the Factory!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: ...So it's you. I somehow imagined you... More imposing. Huh.

lines.speaker: Dwice
lines.line: Shall we begin, pres'?

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Ava, was it? The handwriting's odd. Well, welcome to... the Council!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I'm Efena, President of Corkus!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: *ahem*It's up to you, now. Do your thing. What do you have in store for us?

lines.speaker: Carl
lines.line: A mechanic? Which area? Maybe I have a friend wh-

lines.speaker: Grant
lines.line: Shut it Carl, let her talk.

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: Y'know, you really don't look like the "inventor" type.

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: Plants, huh? That's unusual, I'm curious.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Huh! Go on...

lines.speaker: Mei
lines.line: I see you're familiar with your toy!

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: Wait, you brought such an armour and that's not what you're showcasing?

lines.speaker: Clomius
lines.line: You certainly caught our attention. Go on.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: And we sure hope so!

lines.speaker: Grant
lines.line: Hmpf. What's happening?

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: I think we should give them a bit more time.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Are you two sure you're alright?

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Is that machine that hard to control?

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Alright, you really seem to be struggling.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Lucky for you, I'm in a relatively good mood.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I'm giving you 6 more tries before we call it quits.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Hey, even I'm worried for you now. 5 tries left.

lines.speaker: Mei
lines.line: You don't want to anger Efena.

lines.speaker: Grant
lines.line: Hmpf. Show us your best this time.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: 4 tries left.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: ...Aren't you stressing them out... Too much?

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: Don't spoil our fun, Maxie!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Your fun. I'm not a monster. It's called time management, Sybil.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: 3 tries left. I hate to do this to you, but we have strict schedules.

lines.speaker: Dwice
lines.line: Oh we can definitely see that.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Let's not make it worse for them.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: 2 tries left...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Sorry. Maybe you should've showcased that armour instead.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: By all means, continue. Ninth time's the charm.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Last chance, Ava. This was quite the audience, but we're very much used to that.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Actually, how'd you get one in the first place? Just curious.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Cryptic. I'd have liked that more if you and soldier knew what you were doing.

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: What a shame. I believed in these two.

lines.speaker: Clomius
lines.line: So did I. But you heard Efena. I guess it's over.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Fine. I'll give you one pass. You do have a cool armour, after all.

lines.speaker: Clomius
lines.line: Fancy.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Even I'm getting into this!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: ...Huh.

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: I do believe this has potential. Let us see more of it.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I like the sounds, at least!

lines.speaker: Dwice
lines.line: This almost reminds me of, uuuh...

lines.speaker: Dwice
lines.line: Hold on, it's on the tip of my tongue...

lines.speaker: Dwice
lines.line: Ah right, Avos magic! Right??

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: So soldier knows how to handle machines too? Nifty!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Wait, don't overdo it!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Wait, that magic, that's... No...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Oh my... Oh my grook. This is... Wow...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: It's the real deal. That girl managed to instantly overgrow a flower.

lines.speaker: Mei
lines.line: ...Don't look at us like that, I'm as surprised as you are.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Well, Ava... You've won me over. I'm impressed!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Hey, you alright? It’s not often mechanics impress us. Good job.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: You’re crying?! Aw... There, there. It’s alright, you made it.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I didn't really doubt you with your armour. We have a few questions though!

lines.speaker: Carl
lines.line: This is all really nice, but... How does this work?

lines.speaker: Carl
lines.line: Oh, that component, that's a-.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Shut it, Carl! No one c- Wait. Actually...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: No one in Corkus ever made anything like this. Do you have anything to tell us, or show?

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: While the machine didn't seem to work, you pulled out some... Weird magic. Are you hiding anything?

lines.speaker: Everyone
lines.line: WHAT?

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: There's NO WAY that's true!

lines.speaker: Mei
lines.line: What should we do what should we-

lines.speaker: Dwice
lines.line: Should we seize her?!

lines.speaker: Dwice
lines.line: Flawless?! More like flawful! This was so obvious!

lines.speaker: Dwice
lines.line: I- uh, y'know, didn't want to assume...

lines.speaker: Mei
lines.line: I don't- I don't know!

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: You SHUT UP for now!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Maybe she-

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: 'goes for you too, Maxie!

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: Let's calm down and start ag-

lines.speaker: Clomius
lines.line: So that explains the magic!

lines.speaker: Clomius
lines.line: I just can't believe this!!

lines.speaker: Grant
lines.line: Hmpf? Just take her on the spot!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: EVERYONE! STOP! Soldier, I want you to come here and answer something, immediately.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: We wouldn't have known with such an outfit.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: There's only one thing I want to know.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Did you know, or did she trick you?

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Sure, and then what? What did you hope to accomplish?!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I'm unsure if I should be impressed, distressed or enraged. So I think I'll just be all three. Ava, congratulations.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Oh, darling. You impress then enrage me, and now you want me to pity you.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: You know, your kind has always been...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: So archaic. Always with their spirituality, their flora, their beliefs, their traditions...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I thought electromagic was limited to humans, but it seems like you're miserable at it anyway.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Even then, I see no reason as to why we should let you interact with us. You shouldn't be here.

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: Alright, I've heard enough. That's it.

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: Sybil, wait!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: What just... Everyone! Dismissed! What is that girl doing?! I'll go after her! Nodise, Maxie, you go and help Sybil!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Well... Mo'in, soldier. I was thinking about catching up with you and all after the audience, but...

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: I guess we don't really have time for that now, do we?

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: Wow, Maxie, great time management you got there!

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: Sybil... This is no time to quarrel.

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: Have you seen what just happened? I'm sure even now he'll keep defending the Avos!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Look, there's no time right now. I think soldier and I should go and help.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Nodise... You probably should stay here too. We-

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Wha-What's happening?! Oh dear, I'll just run there!

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: You're- *cough*so good at handling... priorities, Maxie.

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: Save your energy for later, Sybil.

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: Even after... Even after this, I'm sure *cough*he'll keep defending them...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Well look who decided to show up. I thought you would've fled by now.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Soldier!! I'm sure Efena told you already, no time to talk!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Apparently, there's something up there! Try to reach the top! There are strange plants around, see if that helps!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: No time to talk! Just go! There must be a core to hit at the top!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Woah! You did something! You should try that again!

lines.speaker: Grant
lines.line: Hmpf! Leave me be! If you want to climb to reason with your friend, hit some of these weird plants, they seem to throw people around! You don't even need a weapon.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Soldier! Ava's up there, isn't she?

lines.speaker: Mei
lines.line: ...Everyone alright?

lines.speaker: Grant
lines.line: Hmpf. Did soldier take that thing down?

lines.speaker: Grant
lines.line: Hmpf. I certainly am curious now.

lines.speaker: Mei
lines.line: 'think so, yeah.

lines.speaker: Mei
lines.line: Interesting.

lines.speaker: Mei
lines.line: Urgh, what is this thing made of..! Should I go higher?

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Where's soldier? And Ava?!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Oh she better be around here!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Wait, under the rubble, I see something!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: There! Soldier, are you alright? Hello?

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: They unconscious?

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: It... It looks like it.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Look, I'll give you a mission. Find Ava with soldier, and tell her this...

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Soldier?! 'that you? I'm downstairs!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Mo'in, soldier! You're fine! I'm so glad!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Alright, let's get going.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: ...There? *sigh*I hope she's inside.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: ...Huh.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: The Avos chief did mention her once, but this place is crazy!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Ava... I-

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: The president didn't sentence you to death or anything... Quite the opposite, actually.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Well, it's just that-
Don't bother, Maxie. I'll explain myself.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Nice place. I can clearly see how our culture got to you.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Oh, "forgive" is a really strong word, Ava. Look.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I do believe we can all learn a thing or two about this. Ava...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: You broke the law, and as such, you're not allowed in town. Ya understand?

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Look, that machine of yours is impressive. I'm not lying. You're talented.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: But you've definitely made quite the mistake. I did too.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I guess you and I really learnt what ''acting in the heat of the moment'' means, huh.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I have some sort of... Compromise. For us. Maxie?

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Yeah, I'm... interested in working with you. Learning from you.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: You're clearly better at Electromagic than I, so...

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: I'm willing to provide you with what you need. Help you out from time to time.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: You've been alone for so long, Ava. I'm lending you Maxie!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Hey, don't say it like that!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: *chuckles*I'm kidding. The rest of the council isn't aware yet.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: They're not gonna like this, but I'll handle it.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: You know I can't kill you. Can you imagine how the Avos would take it? Even though you're banished...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: But I don't want to either. As for you, soldier...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I'll give you some stuff. I can't imagine how things would've gone if it weren't for you.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Now, you're banished from everyone Ava. I know that's no happy ending.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: But that would've been too easy, don't ya think?

lines.speaker: Efena

lines.line: Goodbye, Ava. Who knows, maybe I'll stop by sometimes.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Goodbye, Ava. Who knows, I might stop by sometimes. After all, you’re very stylish!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Goodbye, Ava. Who knows, I might stop by sometimes. Maybe you'll have figured out that armour of yours.

lines.line: Calm down, Maxie.

lines.line: Honestly, I wouldn't blame him if he decided to skip this one out.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Oh, we get that very often. Especially with mechanics like you. Sorry.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Hey, hey, calm down! I'm here to actually help you... in a way.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I do believe we can all learn a thing or two about this.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: I don't think he'll skip this one. You look cute, Ava! That's your name, right? Handwriting's a little iffy.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Right, right. AVA! Welcome to... the Council.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Hey, Carl! We didn't ask!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: God, I hate to say it, but her mask was flawless.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: And WHY didn't you say so??

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Urgh. Look, there's only one thing I want to know.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: soldier... Did you know, or did she trick you? Be very careful about what you're about to say.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Somehow, you're able to control electromagic? I guess it's not exclusive to humans, then.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Goodbye, Ava. Who knows, maybe I'll stop by sometimes. After all, you're very stylish!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh... So you showed up! I'm glad, I really am!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It's time for me to show the Growth Accelerator to the Corkians.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Look, this time I'll really try and reward you well, alright?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Anyway! I have a plan. You see, I definitely can't easily get in the city.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: The Corkians have a council where they deal with their issues. We can try getting an audience.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I know a way for me to get in the city. That's where you come in! There are some sentries to take care of.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: They're really old models though, somehow. I'll give you a jammer I made for this. Right-Click a robot to use it!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Once you jam one robot, you'll have to jam all others within 20 seconds! So try to plan ahead and locate them all before jamming one!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Tell me once you're ready. I'll throw you in there. I'll join you afterwards. You'll see!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Well then, first off, take this!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Now, just stand still... I gotta try something on you...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Thanks! These robots were harmless but hey, better safe than sorry right?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Anyway, we need to get ready to meet the Corkian Council.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: And I think... I need a disguise. I don't like hiding myself, but I don't have a choice.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Thanks to some plans I got, I know where to find some. Follow me!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Here we are! I'm pretty sure we can find some outfits in there.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll stand here to quickly hide in case anyone comes.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Just look around, and come back with what you think looks better!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Yeah, I am letting you choose my outfit. Aren't you lucky? Go and get me the fanciest clothes!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Shoot, I think someone's coming!! Come back!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: ...Nevermind! Keep looking... Sorry...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'm trusting you. We Avos aren't exactly into... Fashion. Then again, they're not into Electromagic either, so what do I know.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, hold on...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: So, how do I look?!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I feel like... I'm about to go to work.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: At the very least, I'll probably blend in very well!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Now, I'm gonna be completely honest about this, so don't panic, but...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I have... absolutely NO idea how we could even get an audience.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I think we need to split up and try to find out how to get one from the Council.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll be around the town center if ya need me for anything! I'll ask around. You should too!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: One last thing, though... Sorry if that's a little weird but...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: ... What's your name?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: soldier, huh? That's... A nice name. Well, good luck!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I've already seen plenty of green in my lifetime, y'know.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Well, I know you folks sure do love money. Maybe we can get noticed with this...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hmm... You know, this could actually work!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I have no idea how this audience things works but I could try to get people to notice me!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Well, we should split up and meet up later to see what information we have. Just ask around town!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll be around the town center if you got any information!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: One last thing, though... Sorry if thats a little weird but...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: So, how do I look?!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Ya got good taste! I always wanted to explore the ocean, y'know?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, thanks for helping me out so much. You've been such a huge help!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Well, this isn't over, of course. And to tell you the truth...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I, uh, have no idea how to get an audience... Sorry?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I think we need to split up and try to find out how to get one.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll be around the town center if ya need me for anything!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: One last thing, though... Sorry if that's a little weird but...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: ... What's your name?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: soldier, huh? That's... A nice name. Well, good luck!

lines.line: Oh, and check this mask out! Time to be Ava the human!

lines.line: I feel like... I'm not even supposed to be wearing this.

lines.line: I saw this dog, and... Well, that's besides the point. You'll tell me later!

lines.line: Look, this audience thing is foreign to me but I feel like it won't really be an issue with this... thing.

lines.line: Well, we still need information on who to even talk to for that stuff... I'll ask around.

lines.line: You should too! I'll be around the town center! Come by once you got enough information!

lines.line: Oh, hey! I got something!!

lines.line: Alright, so it's not really on the legal side of things, BUT apparently...

lines.line: There's some sort of... Shady dealer you can buy an audience invitation from?

lines.line: I'm sure there are other ways, but the dude should be in the castle to the east, first door to the left.

lines.line: Do with that what you will. I guess I'll... Keep looking.

lines.line: Hey, what's up? I do have somethin'!

lines.line: Hmm... So we can go see a receptionist and they just might grant us an audience. Got it!

lines.line: I'd say we have plenty of chances with that fancy armour you got me.

lines.line: I believe it's in the castle to the east, on the first left? Though...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'm sure there are other ways to go about this. Like that receptionist, for one! So she's in the last room of the castle, right?

lines.line: In fact, if you want me to follow you there, I can do that! Just tell me!

lines.line: Well, good luck searching!

lines.line: [24 Emerald Blocks]? Is that a lot? I'm not human, y'know! Well, anyway!

lines.line: Buy that if you want, but I'm certain there are other ways to obtain an audience. You don't really have to buy that.

lines.line: Well, I'll just... Keep looking then.

lines.line: Oh? You found the dealer as well as one other way to get an audience?

lines.line: 24 Emerald Blocks, huh? No clue if that's a lot. I'd say we should try your other way! What is it?

lines.line: It's... Apparently really hard? Oh... Well, that's not helpful. Maybe we can still give it a go?

lines.line: It's difficult to get an audience? Well, it's worth a try, right? Maybe they'll see me as a wealthy lad!

lines.line: It's... Apparently really hard? Huh. Well, we should still give it a go? I look fancy, surely they'll listen!

lines.line: I'll go back to the town center. It's up to you if you want to risk all that money, if you even have it! We'll figure something else out.

lines.line: It's just... I honestly don't care about listening to the law anymore.

lines.line: Let's hope we get this right. You lead, I follow!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Wait wait wait, I'm sure you're onto something but I'd rather not do anything fishy in town. Do what you wish, I'll hang around at the town center.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: WOO! Oh, sorry, we'll take our leave!

lines.line: Thank you so much! Sorry about my face, I'm... New in town. Bye!

lines.line: I can't believe we're actually progressing! This is so exciting!

lines.line: Alright, we need to test the machine before the audience. I've made some tweaks!

lines.line: Meet me near the northern entrance if ya want a lift. Alternatively, you can just go by the Workshop if you're into walking!

lines.line: Remember that hill next to the Workshop? We'll work there again. Tell me when you're ready for the lift.

lines.line: Oh no, time's up! It was supposed to be easy... Hold on, I'm booting it up again.

lines.speaker: Ava

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Just tell me when you're up for another round!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Halfway there!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Please don't break..!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Now we're talking!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You gotta admit, this has to be revolutionary!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: The corkian council... I hope they're nice. I really do. And you're coming!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, let's meet up near the receptionist. Say, want another lift? I can't get you inside the city, though!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Cool, let's go! I still have to change back and wear the outfit you got me!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll drop you off around the city outskirts. See ya!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: See ya!

lines.line: This is it, then. Soldier, I'm... scared.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I guess it's normal to be stressed before an important event...

lines.line: Look, once we go in there, I'm really counting on you to go all in with the machine.

lines.line: I don't want to stress you out, but... Please know this is important to me.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, we should go now or else I'll just chicken out or somethin'.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Just... tell me once you're ready, I guess.

lines.line: Stay close to me... Let's go.

lines.line: Where's... Everyone?

lines.line: This is the right place... I'm sure it is...

lines.line: Who-

lines.line: H-Hello everyone. I'm a mechanic and I have something for you...

lines.line: *click*HELLO THERE EVERYO- *click*Wrong button.

lines.line: I'll just try not to replicate my mistake back then with the Avos.

lines.speaker: Ava

lines.speaker: Ava

lines.line: No... No no no no..! Just hold on, guys!

lines.line: What happened?! I'll... I'll boot the machine up again!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'm really, really counting on you...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh grook, oh no... Hold on!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright guys, don't worry... We got this.

lines.line: I'll just... wait for your signal, soldier.

lines.line: ...Thanks.

lines.line: No, no- Don't worry! We're showing you that... It can shut off instead of blowing up...

lines.line: I... I have my ways.

lines.line: I don't need soldier. I'll show you. I'll do it myself, one final chance.

lines.line: I... How do I put this...

lines.line: Don’t you dare touch- Gah! I’ll show you. I’ll show everyone what you’re missing out on!

lines.line: Huh, that armour's actually powerful. Now, if you'll excuse me, I'll show everyone what I'm really capable of.

lines.line: ...You're here. Here to fix my own mistakes, right?

lines.line: As well as yours too. Maybe things would've gone different if you didn't fail the audience, don't you think?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I regret this... I sho uldn't have acted this way, this wasn't supposed to happen, I...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I can't stay, soldier. The president's one thing, but the others... It's safe to say no one's gonna welcome me with open arms, y'know?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You... I assume you're here to take me.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Go ahead, then. Do it. I don't have anything to lose anymore. I've already lost everything.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I don't want your pity. I have no one. You're making this harder for yourself.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: What do you mean? Why should I trust you?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: So you're here. Are you... Forgiving me?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: First the Avos, then you, huh. So it's come full circle.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: ...soldier? If you stop by the Workshop later, I'll set up something for you as well.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Bye. Thanks. For everything.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Go on, I'll follow you. I just gotta finish this first!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, don't go alone head first! Talk to me!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Wait, let's figure something out!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Look, we need a plan. Talk to me.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You're a lucky one, you know that right?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll meet you back at the Workshop.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: What we're looking for should be around here...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Well, have you found anything?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Time to go and repair some pipes or something!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: ...Is that someone crying over there? Eh, I'm not sure my social skills can handle that.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll try talking to more people!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright then, let's get goin'!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: So, that dealer is in there, huh? Let's make sure to keep going. And avoid that place.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Let's hope we don't get rejected this time around.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey! I saw you run towards the castle. What did you do?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: ...Wait, what? You went to the receptionist alone, just like that?!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: And you booked an audience for tomorrow morning??

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I... I'm really grateful. What a relief. I did some tweaking regarding the machine, so you should come and test with me!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Let's meet up near the northern entrance if ya want a lift. Alternatively, you can just meet me by the Workshop if you're into walking!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You're amazing, you know that right?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You helped deal with WHA-

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It's- It- Uh, helps plants. Grow. Yeah.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'm really, really counting on you, soldier...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I - I really didn't want this... I wanted to help people, soldier! Not... Not...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I sure have impressed everyone. So I guess not all's lost, huh?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll be the talk of an entire nation!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Gosh, I really am going crazy aren't I?..

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I just... I don't know what to do... I reached rock bottom...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I doomed my people, their people, and I... I had still so much to do...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Go. Just go.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Y-you!! I- oh no... I'm... It's over..!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: soldier, once you come back here, you'll be able to get some of my gadgets.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, let's go!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Let's get going then...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'm quite curious about this! Corkian outfits! Exciting!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Don't worry about me right now, just keep looking!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I saw some girl runnin' around in circles and looking all stressed over at the Armour Merchant. Maybe you can check that out?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Don't worry, we got this, let's keep looking!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh? You found the dealer as well as one other way to get an audience?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: [24 Emerald Blocks], huh? No clue if that's a lot. I'd say we should try your other way! What is it?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: There's a receptionist for audiences? How convenient! We should go talk to her then!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: What? It's apparently really hard? Huh. Well, we should still give it a go? I look fancy, surely they'll listen!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Buy from that weird dealer if ya want, but we also should try to go see that receptionist. Tell me if you want me to follow you there.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, let's go then. I'd say we should avoid the dealer, I definitely don't want to get on the bad side of the law!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, don't go back in there! Just hold on, we got this!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Wait wait wait what did I just tell yo- I'll just make myself small...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Maybe that's our ticket? I don't know, I'm just a law-abiding citizen. Well, actually, about that...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'm right behind ya!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Uhh...... Tha-

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, so... I'm here with soldier to show you a little something!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It's actually quite revolutionary! It's a Growth Accelerator!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: That piqued your interest, right? Well get ready!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It's better outdoors, but I believe I can make it work here.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll set it up. Just sit back and watch!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: There.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: What happened, soldier?! I'll... I'll boot the machine up again!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Actually... I do.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Every. Single. One of you.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I come up to you with an incredible breakthrough, and you can't even see past my feathers.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: And then, here to take me, I suppose. Right?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Y'know, I noticed you always were one to follow orders. Well, what you're lookin' for is on top of the plant.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It's all over. My life's over...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: So... Maxie, was it? Right?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, show me what you found...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Wait, you don't have anything yet? There must be some stuff lying around!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I lead, you follow!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll just wear whatever works best for us.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: We don't have that much time you know!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You lead, I follow!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: There we go!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Wait, where are you going?! ...Fine, I'll wait nearby, just come back quickly!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It's difficult to get an audience? Well, it's worth a try, right? Maybe they'll see me as a wealthy lad!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Leaving town? I'll stick around, just come back eventually, alright?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Efena... She's nicer than Chief, that's for sure...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You're leaving?! ...Understandable, actually. Just buy the damn thing yourself, I'll cover the cost.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll try my best, soldier!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: No no no don't go in first, please wait up!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I can't do this by myself, soldier!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Or... Just leave, I guess? Nevermind?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hurry! It's really close by!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh, you don't have anything. Have you checked the nearby roo ms?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, I bet whoever's in charge will be impressed with my fancy clothes AND that letter.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, come back!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Do you think it'd work with that Mechanic outfit? Well, I don't think that matters anymore!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Huh, you're leaving through here? I just wonder why t hey never fixed this hole, it's been here for too long! Well, I'll head back to town.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Y'know, that is a pretty lookin' place! However, it also happens not to be the right direction!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hold on a minute!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, ya got this!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I have no idea how this audience thing works, but I could try to get people to notice me!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll be around the town center if ya got any information!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I was thinking they'd see me as a potential investor, but with that letter there's nothin' to worry about.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I get that often, yeah. Green isn't really associated with money for me.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I enjoy nature and all, right? Well, I present to you...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: The Growth Accelerator!!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: As you should be! Let me quickly set the machine up.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Ah, isn't it beautiful...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Nothing? It's fine, just keep looking!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: An audience is booked, and you didn't even give me the chance to show my cool armour!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I screwed up with my people, then with the humans, then...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Go, soldier. You're not done with my mess.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: ...Wow.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: So you did come back! Hang tight!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Haha!... Wait, that's not it. Urgh.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, I'll just give that to you. Though, you probably don't know how to use it, heh!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Looks like we got another shot. I still have some water left.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Alright, I'm trusting you.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: So this was the one! Alright, great!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Nicely done. I'm not exactly done here personally, though.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I wonder what the other sides would've done...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: ...why yes come to me I probably have a lot of money by the looks of my outfit!... Would that work?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You ARE coming back... Right??

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Soon you'll be able to cut down this mess. So go ahead, ''soldier''. Do your thing.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Why'd you leave me like that? I still need you, y'know!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Well, it's fine. The way to operate the machine is simple!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You just have to swiftly press buttons! That's the simplest way I can explain it.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Since you seem in a hurry, let's get this over with. Tell me when to start, I'll give you the remote.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It's... Quite hard to move around with that outfit, actually.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I'll just... Hang around town. What do people do exactly? 'guess I'l l figure it out.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh, you're already leaving, just like that? Well, meet me back at the Avos Chief hut!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Or... Just leave, I guess? See ya later??

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh, you're already leaving, just like that? Well, meet me back near the Corkus receptionist! You're missing out on this though... Oh well!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: 't would've been too good to be true, right?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Leaving so soon? We didn't even get started! Oh well, see ya' later. I'll wait for you.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Left it is then. Let's hope we get it right this time.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Second time's the charm.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: What? Wait, no, come back! Urgh, I'll go back to the town center, we'll, uh, come back, alright?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: And you booked an audience for tomorrow morning?! How did you...

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: That's fine, I'm sure you just have to show her your resolve or something.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Wait up, you're too fast!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Thanks! I'll try not to disappoint you.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Thank you! soldier, let's get going!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: This is all... Very hard to believe.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Hey, don't leave already! Oh well, I'll be waiting here, pick a good outfit for me!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: It's... Apparently really hard? Oh... Well, that's not helpful. Maybe we can still give it a go?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I wonder how that place works... How are they transforming powders like that?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: No matter how hard, we should definitely try that out. I mean, have you seen that armor?!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh, you're already leaving, just like that? Well, meet me back near the Corkus receptionist!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Left... Right... Center... 'up to you.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: The dude's insane, don't think you can figure out the right one. Just pick a random side.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Look, we're both lost. Just choose one side.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh, you're already leaving, just like that? Well, meet me back at the Avos Chief hut! You're missing out on this though... Oh well!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: You wanna go again? Sure!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Good luck! I'm countin' on ya!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh, uh... Thanks? It is? I think??

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Huh? Not ready? Come back soon, I need ya!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: I sure hope this works... for you.

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Oh-uh, it's fine! Don't worry!

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: No no no- look, it's fine. We can get it right this time, ok?

lines.speaker: Ava
lines.line: Wait, you can't just pick this cool outfit for me and just- Whatever, just come back alright?

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: Oh, greetings. I seldom see humans around these parts.

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: I'm from Corkus. You ought to have heard of it at one point.

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: Of course they've heard of it, like, come on!

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: We are part of the Council. Maybe we'll meet there someday.

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: So, what brings you here? I'm personally researching about the region.

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: And I'm starting to get bored to death!

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: sigh You seem to be a soldier of sorts. From Wynn, right? I've never been there.

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: Uh, Nodise? There's a literal WAR over there? Of course we've never been there?!

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: You know, Sybil, sometimes you just have to go and take a leap of faith.

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: Hey, soldier, no point bothering you any longer. I have some research to do.

lines.speaker: Sybil
lines.line: You think I can't go to Wynn?! Well, maybe I'll go alone!

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: Oh... It's you. I wasn't expecting that. Remember the Corkian Council?

lines.speaker: Nodise
lines.line: There are tensions, sure, but we're doing fine back home.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Oh... It's you. 'figured you'd pop here one day.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: There's no way she made that power armour by herself. I feel like I heard 'bout something like that at one point...

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: That great azure clothing she had... I'm sure you stole it. Am I right?

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: That mechanic outfit Ava had... You stole it, didn't you? No point in lyin'.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: That one rich outfit she wore last time... This was your doing, right? As in, you totally stole it, right?!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Gahah! I knew it! You actually stole from some friends of mine, y'know?!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Oh, so you got it from that room downstairs?! ...damn. You might've stolen some of my friend's clothes, then!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: 'wonder what these guys are doin' now. 'kinda left Corkus... I don't like goodbyes and all, so I ignored that.

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: Oh, uh, well, bye?!

lines.speaker: Efena
lines.line: See ya!

lines.speaker: Lozeg
lines.line: Interesting to see a Human wanting to see a Dwarven play!

lines.speaker: Lozeg
lines.line: Just take a seat and enjoy the show.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Wait, is that- Hey, soldier! It's so good to see you!

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: Hello, to the people of Gavel, glad to see so many here!

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: I hope you'll enjoy the play, and that it'll be very educational too. I will be tonight's narrator.

lines.speaker: Babbi
lines.line: Pheeeew. I think we outran the villagers.

lines.speaker: Dwarfi
lines.line: I think we are safe here in the mountains. Oh look. Shiny ores. This is like a gold mine.

lines.speaker: Dwarfi
lines.line: These nice minerals are very nice, let us start digging.

lines.speaker: Babbi
lines.line: What is that?! A DEMON.

lines.speaker: Demon
lines.line: I am a dangerous monster and I will not let you mine these diamonds. We are the Doguns, and we will kill you!!

lines.speaker: Demon
lines.line: Graoaoro. I will eat you all for my afternoon demon luncheon.

lines.speaker: Arock
lines.line: We must protect ourselves!

lines.speaker: Demon
lines.line: MOAHAHAHHA! BEGONE TINY DWARVES.

lines.speaker: Arock
lines.line: Ahhhh. I am dying...dying!

lines.speaker: Demon
lines.line: MOAHAHAHA. WE WILL KILL ALL OF YOU.

lines.speaker: Babbi
lines.line: We need to forge better weapons so we can fight back.

lines.speaker: Gagly
lines.line: Good idea! We will use our intelligence to slay the demons.

lines.speaker: Demon
lines.line: YOU CANNOT BEAT US, WE CAN SUMMON DRAGONS WITH OUR MAGIC.

lines.speaker: Gagly
lines.line: Dragons are no match for us?? CHARGE!

lines.speaker: Gagly
lines.line: We have won. Hooray. And now we have established a great citadel, Rodoroc!

lines.speaker: Gagly
lines.line: The dwarven intellect beat the sheer power of the demons magic.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: Thank you all for watching!

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: I hope you enjoyed the show, and learned something new today!

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: We are continuing the celebration at the old Demon City. Follow the red banners outside Rodoroc to get there.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.line: Meet you all there!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Ugh, that was horrible.. Like I said before, this war was a genocide. Don't believe any of the lies they try and feed you.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Ugh, that was awful. Don't believe anything you see here, human. History is written by the victors.

lines.speaker: Marock
lines.line: Welcome, one and all! Dwarven brothers and sisters, guests and visitors!

lines.speaker: Mahou
lines.line: Wow, I didn't know Dwarves could learn such magic! Beats the heck out of firecrackers!

lines.speaker: Marock
lines.line: Magnificent! Thank you very much to our fire casters. Now, ladies and gents, your attention to the main stage please!

lines.speaker: Marock
lines.line: For the last 900 years we have captured renegade Doguns that escaped the war, and this year is no exception!

lines.speaker: Marock
lines.line: We shall now entomb the foul demon to join the ranks of the other Doguns on display.

lines.speaker: Marock
lines.line: Bring it out, guards!

lines.speaker: Marock
lines.line: Note its magical might, its aggressive nature, its intense heat, and its fierce appearance.

lines.speaker: Marock
lines.line: All no match for the ingenuity and comeradery of the Dwarven nations!

lines.speaker: Dogun
lines.line: M-Monsters... You all...are the demons here...

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Every year, every year, every single YEAR you do this. You all need to open your god-blessed eyes for once!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Do you all really believe everything they tell you? Do you all just lap it up like dogs?!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Our side won the war, but does that really mean we were in the right? I'll tell you right now, it doesn't!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: We all see it- The Doguns have feelings, family and thoughts, just like anyone else here!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: You are encasing live Doguns for entertainment. Public execution! This twisted display is more demonic than they ever could dream to be!

lines.speaker: Marock
lines.line: Guards! Get this propaganda spewing half pint to the Molten Core Prison, north side.

lines.speaker: Dwarven Guard
lines.line: Come along, sir. Let's not make more of a scene.

lines.speaker: Crowd
lines.line: Why would Axelus say something so blatantly wrong?

lines.speaker: Crowd
lines.line: What was he talking about? That was all nonsense!

lines.speaker: Crowd
lines.line: Are they really taking him to the Molten Core? You've heard the horror stories about there, right?

lines.speaker: Crowd
lines.line: Well, the expression 'no hope blows from the north' came from there, since it's on the north side...

lines.speaker: Marock
lines.line: Apologies, all. I shall provide us all with a quick way back to Rodoroc on the floor here. We hope you enjoyed the show, despite the interruption!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: You came at the right time, soldier. It's good to see you're still interested in what's really going on here..

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: I see I got your attention. Interested in the truth.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Now do you see? Everything that I told you about when we rescued those flerisi was indeed true...

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Well, now you have read what I read. The truth...or the lie.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Ah, you made it. Come and meet Korzim.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: Welcome...Human. I...am Korzim.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: We...are those who...want peace. I am son...of the Dogun Chief... I have...been banished.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: The coalition is a small group of believers in the truth. The Doguns aren't demons, and the Dwarves aren't all brainwashed.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: But of course, we have to live in hiding. The Doguns won't tolerate Dwarves and the Dwarves hunt traitors and "Demons".

lines.speaker: Barden
lines.line: Right now, we're trying to convince the public. But it's proving difficult, if not impossible.

lines.speaker: Barden
lines.line: It isn't 900 years ago. We have the technology and supply chains to live here peacefully, but they just won't listen!

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: We have...a plan... To win over...my people...that is.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Korzim has told us that dragon bone is sacred to his people. We had to make some connections, but we have a way to get it now.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: If you want, you could come with us. We can explain more of the situation later. Exit's through the back.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: The others...are just up ahead. I'll let you through...our tunnel.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: We use...earth and...fire...elements. It is slow...like us...but powerful.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Soldier, over here! Near the skull.

lines.speaker: Barden
lines.line: We got this drill all the way from Corkus. Axelus had to pay a king's ransom to buy it, but this ought to work!

lines.speaker: Barden
lines.line: AAAAGH! Idiot Corkus swindlers! Damn it all! How many emeralds did we waste?!

lines.speaker: Barden
lines.line: Ugh, do you have any experience with machines? You might have some idea of how in the hell to fix this hunk of junk.

lines.speaker: Barden
lines.line: Fantastic, soldier! We got the bone! Couldn't have done it without you.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: You can take it back to the coalition base. Barden and I will need to pack up before we join you.

lines.speaker: Barden
lines.line: Just knock on the black block in front of the cave we arrived in.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Great, you got back alright.
Shh. Do you hear that?
There are voices behind this wall, and the trail ends here.
We have no vaults here. Must be traitors... The King really wants to see Axelus.
Stand back! I'll ready the charges...

lines.speaker: Pens'r
lines.line: Axelus! You are under arrest for high treason!

lines.speaker: Pens'r
lines.line: The king has sent for you personally.

lines.speaker: Pens'r
lines.line: If you don't come with us we wi-

lines.speaker: Pens'r
lines.line: ...oh Lord, this must be why! D-Doguns?!

lines.speaker: Pens'r
lines.line: He is consorting with the enemy! Axelus, they've tainted your soul!

lines.speaker: Pens'r
lines.line: Entomb these Doguns, and slay their Dwarven thralls!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Is everyone okay!?

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: We'll stay around here, we aren't welcome in the village.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: But...bring them...the dragon bone...as a gift. If they accept it...they might accept us.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: You are free to enter the village but we will stay back and wait until the coast is clear. Keep going.

lines.speaker: Plario
lines.line: What is...that on the...cliff to the south?

lines.speaker: Dwarven Scout
lines.line: Hey, aren't those...Doguns?! A whole settlement...

lines.speaker: Dwarven Scout
lines.line: They've been gathering forces! We must inform Rodoroc immediately!

lines.speaker: Plario
lines.line: Human. Come talk to me... Now.

lines.speaker: Plario
lines.line: Human... That Dwarf, he saw us...

lines.speaker: Plario
lines.line: They will...destroy us...  If he reports...back to Rodoroc.

lines.speaker: Plario
lines.line: We need to...prepare our defenses. We need all the...help we can get.

lines.speaker: Plario
lines.line: Wait... What are...you holding? Dragon bone...? Just what we need...

lines.speaker: Plario
lines.line: Human...if you promise to help us...I will grant you access to...our secret elevators... You can get up and...down the heights with those.

lines.speaker: Plario
lines.line: Please return to...us when you reach level 92. Take this...badge so the...others recognize you...as an ally. One of the elevators is...to the south.

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
lines.line: You are so young...to be fighting...a war so old. Still...it is appreciated.

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
lines.line: I am sorry...to welcome you all...in such troubled times.

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
lines.line: We thought...we could hide in safety... But there is...no place left to hide.

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
lines.line: Aval...would have us...leave the Heights... But we...would not survive.

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
lines.line: We must...evacuate the settlement...immediately. They...are coming...again.
Ouch, I'm sorry... Excuse us!
We heard what happened, Soldier.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Please! You all know me, I'm not with the side of the government. Hear me out, we can fix this!

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
lines.line: Guards...

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Stop! I have been hiding from the Dwarves just as much as anyone here, they've been after me too!

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
lines.line: Why...would we trust... you...of all Dwarves?

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
lines.line: How...could you even help? They...won't listen to you.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: I know all the war strategies and weapon cache locations.

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
lines.line: Treason...against your own kind...? How will you...manage this?

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: The human and I will sneak into the armoury and sabotage their equipment. Korzim will help you Doguns evacuate someplace safer.

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
lines.line: I am...yet wary of you...but we will...follow your plan...Dwarf. Korzim...lead us...to safety.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Soldier, follow the southern road from Rodoroc, towards the Sky Islands entrance. I'll be waiting there for you near the armoury.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Shh! Get behind here, and look towards the armoury doors.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: We need to sneak in when they aren't looking, got it? But we need to be fast.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: If they close that door, we'll only have one option left, and it's a huge risk. Those Dwarven gates are almost unbreakable.

lines.speaker: Rodoroc Commander
lines.line: Alright boys, let's close this up and head to base B.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Aaah! Charge them! HEY, STOP RIGHT THERE, SOLDIERS!

lines.speaker: Rodoroc Commander
lines.line: It's the traitor! Capture them, now! There's only one reason they would be near the armoury! //Commander

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Is that all of them? We're out of danger, at least, but they still shut the door, damn it!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Gah, all that for nothing! You're not too banged up, are you?

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Well, I said there's another way, but it's not a guarantee. Hurry, follow me.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Urgh, damn it. They almost never bother to close this door, and now of all times...

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: There's nothing for it. They'll be sending reinforcements soon, we need a way through here.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Those black bricks look breakable...but that won't solve the door, will it?

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Alright, let's destroy these machines! You see the two cannons?

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Nice work! That will slow them down. We're not done yet, we need to pay the king a visit. Let's head further into Rodoroc.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Hurry! Through here, to the power core!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: This is a geothermal power core. If we can disrupt it, it should slow them down.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: The hypocrites used Dogun magic to make this... It's lucky, honestly. I know how to work it.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Grr, this is harder than I thought!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Ah! Don't let them get too close!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Look, look! It's working!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: I hate that you're having to fight my people, but I wouldn't be asking for help if it weren't needed.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Dwarvern society isn't as great as they make it out to be. The poorest are hidden away.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: If we can convince the king that it's not worth the fight, he may back down.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Don't let the guards catch you. Stay out of sight, got it?

lines.speaker: King of Rodoroc
lines.line: I can't say I'm surprised, Axelus. Guards, let them be.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: You know why I'm here, father. We haven't got any more chances to stop this.

lines.speaker: King of Rodoroc
lines.line: Axelus, you know why we have to maintain the lie. Think about the people, how they would react.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: We can not be responsible for the lies of our ancestors! This is ridiculous and you know it!

lines.speaker: King of Rodoroc
lines.line: Axelus, if the people found out, everything would descend to chaos. There would be riots, revolutions!

lines.speaker: King of Rodoroc
lines.line: If you hadn't turned traitor and gone gallivanting off with the Doguns, you would be in a better position to convince me.

lines.speaker: King of Rodoroc
lines.line: As it is now, you are too little and too late. The war has already begun.

lines.speaker: King of Rodoroc
lines.line: The armoury that a certain someone decided to sabotage won't make any difference.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: You will commit genocide so you don't have to face the consequences of your lies?

lines.speaker: King of Rodoroc
lines.line: I will be the hero of our nation, and my name will forever be remembered as the King who brought peace.

lines.speaker: King of Rodoroc
lines.line: I have nothing left to say to you. See yourselves out behind the throne. I'll let you use the trading tunnel to Thanos in the southern caves, if you just step back and let me handle things.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: I'm not giving up on this. I'm going back in, I know he can be reasoned with!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Give this letter to Korzim in the Dogun village when you reach level 93.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: I'm going to have one last talk with my father.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Try to destroy each machine. Stone is used for ammo while tnt will blow up the machine. Good luck!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: I'll meet you at the end of the slums.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: We...have an issue. A dire one... Where is...Axelus at a time...like this?

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: He is trying to...reason with the Dwarven King? There is...no one else...then. You... You will have to...help.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: Soldier...I take back my statement. They have already begun... There cannot be reasoning.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: Interrupting...at this point will have...disastrous consequences. We must let them continue...and pray they fail.

lines.speaker: Korzim?
lines.line: Hoho...! Over here...fine traveler! Join me at the gates!

lines.speaker: Edula
lines.line: ...Korzim...what in the name of all that is holy is that disguise?

lines.speaker: Edula
lines.line: I'm flabbergasted you fooled anyone with that thing! How did you stop the beard from burning?

lines.speaker: Edula
lines.line: But, erm...more importantly, who's the bucko in the fancy armour there?

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: An ally...of the coalition. No time...Edula. Doguns... summoning... Garaheth.

lines.speaker: Edula
lines.line: So...so it's really down to that low, then. Burning your own house down to kill the rats.

lines.speaker: Edula
lines.line: Good thing we've got this prepared. One fallout will prevent the next. Soldier, I've got a list of materials we need!

lines.speaker: Edula
lines.line: You will need [10 Fire Webs] . The Heatscar Spiders under the town make them, there's a cave right by the entrance arch.

lines.speaker: Edula
lines.line: Then, [3 Magmatic Crystals] from the Maex mines. I'd get them myself, but...I'm banned from there since the rubber mallet incident.

lines.speaker: Edula
lines.line: Lastly, [1 Crystallized Lava]. The closest source is in the lava lake just outside Maex. There's a protruding crater in the lake.

lines.speaker: Edula
lines.line: Mhm, looks like everything's in order. Now, for a short explanation.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: We must... visit... Sanba... the enchanter.

lines.speaker: Sanba
lines.line: Erm...Korzim, what on earth are you doing here? It's not safe for you!

lines.speaker: Sanba
lines.line: Supposing you're here to help, Soldier. Garaheth's being summoned if you're getting this...

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: Soldier... This... This used to be...a Dogun town. The Dwarves rendered it barren.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: I will try to run through...as quickly as possible. The ice is...painful.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: We must... move fast... or... we will both.... freeze.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: Oh no... I think... It's... COLLAPSING.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: My... feet are.... solid... Keep... running.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: This is it... The thing that... Killed my families... 4 True Ice.

lines.speaker: Sanba
lines.line: Impressive, you two. Must have been tough to get that...doubly so for Korzim.

lines.speaker: Sanba
lines.line: ...that's the barracks door. That's the barracks door!!

lines.speaker: Maex Soldier
lines.line: Men! We have to meet for briefing on the surface, the war is due any hour now! Move faster!

lines.speaker: Sanba
lines.line: They're already going?! We're out of time! Korzim is waiting for you just upstairs when you reach level 94. Go train! NOW!

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: The crystal formation... It is definitely here.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: I will clear the lava... On my signal, move. And do not stop.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: Move! Move! MOVE!

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: Oh no... We got... Trapped.

lines.speaker: Korzim
lines.line: Soldier... Do you have...the staff? And the amulet...?

lines.speaker: Soldier
lines.line: The first group has already started their climb, let's hurry.

lines.speaker: Rodoroc Citizen
lines.line: Hey! Everyone, the king has someone in the cage! It's been years since we used it!

lines.speaker: Rodoroc Citizen
lines.line: Wait, that's Axelus up there!! The king locked up his son?! What in the world?

lines.speaker: Rodoroc Citizen
lines.line: I heard he was consorting with demons, but that can't possibly be true, can it?

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: For the last time, they are not demons!! Gods, I've been telling you this whole time! Not even my father will listen to reason!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: If I don't get freed we're doomed, you hear me?! We won't survive another war! As your prince I demand to be freed!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Listen, the statues are climbable and there's a control panel for the lava siphons near them! Now help me so we all don't die!

lines.speaker: Rodoroc Citizen
lines.line: Wait, that human just defaced the hero's monument!! Are they working with the demons too?

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Soldier! I didn't think you'd be back, but we need to leave, now! Meet me outside!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Soldier! Over here, to the right! By the cannon! I'm commandeering this thing.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: We need to get up to the Doguns before the Dwarves begin their assault, or before the Doguns take their last resort.

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Get in the cannon, now! You've got your armour, you might end up charred and covered in soot but you'll be fine!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: Don't tell anyone we shot ourselves out of a cannon, I'll never live it down. Now come on, to the Dogun village, hurry!

lines.speaker: Axelus
lines.line: WAIT, STOP THE-

lines.speaker: Dogun Chieftain
