lines.line: But if neither of them tickle ye fancy... I've always wanted [1 Shiny Shell] - they're just so sparkly! Ye can find them in the cave south-east of here, beside the ladders.

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: Ye get me one o' those three, landwalker, and ye can have my outfit!

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: Landwalker! Have ye found any of the items yet?

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: Remember, I'd trade it to ye for [30 Emerald Blocks], [3 Dragonling Eggs] or [1 Shiny Shell] from the cave to the south-east!

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: So, landwalker, are ye ready to pay up? I can see emeralds in ye pocket, hand 'em over.

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: Aye, landwalker! Is that the sparkle of a shiny shell I spot in ye pocket?! Lemme have a look...

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: Alrigh'! Those're exactly what I've been lookin' for. Give it here, lemme have a look...

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: Alright, landwalker. Ye can have me outfit. 'ere, lemme just get changed inside.

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: Here ye go, landlubber. I hope ye get some kinda use out of it, whatever ye want it for.

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: Aye, landwalker. Hope yer getting some use outta that outfit!

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: Eh? Get outta here, landwalker. I'm a busy gal, ain' got time to babysit one of ye.

lines.speaker: Egpla
lines.line: Aye, my queen! T'was an honour to watch ye wearing my outfit as you battled for blood and glory.

lines.speaker: Angry Contestant
lines.line: Ugh! Ye can't be the queen, ye can barely fly an airship!

lines.speaker: Angry Contestant
lines.line: No! I'll be the queen! I'm much more qualified than any of you sky rats!

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Gather round, ladies. The next Queen is about to be selected!

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: As ye know, our previous queen suffered a... nasty fate, murdered on her very own airship by a Wynn soldier.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: But in the ashes of her honour, a new queen shall rise! Three trials. That's what ye all face now.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Only one, who passes all trials laid before her, will pass and gain the title of Skyraider Queen.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Now, I introduce ye all to the first trial, to test yer capability at a vital skill for queenship - combat!

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Ladies, you may now begin!

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Arr, that weeded out the weak. A queen must be strong to lead.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Now, to the second challenge - the task of flight! Ye can't be a queen if ye can't fly yer airship!

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Make sure ye bring yer sharpest eyes, girls, one false move and death awaits.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: This task should get rid of the rest of ye unworthy.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Well lookie here, an amateur made it through her flight.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Well let’s see how you hold up in the final task ladies.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Yer ain’ a pirate at all if ye can't steal, but this is different.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: This is the real deal. Stealin’ from a highly secure mansion.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Yer job is to steal a priceless treasure from the richest family in the sky.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: We'll be waiting with a getaway airship at the extraction point, everyone else'll be left behind.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Remember, this be the real thing, and the consequences of failure will be severe. Good luck, ladies.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: This is the garden we'll tunnel into, and yer'll 'ave to find a way into the Mansion, maybe yer can just ask nicely, heh.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Then yer'll have to sneak through these corridors to reach the treasure - and don't let the guards find yer, or they'll lock yer up and throw away the key.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: This, o' course, is the mythical treasure that yer want to grab and get outta here, stat. I'm sure there'll be some extra defenses around, though...

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: And finally yer'll have to escape outta this window right 'ere - I'll be waitin' with an airship to carry all of ye out.

lines.speaker: Skyraider
lines.line: Aye', think ye ready to try grabbin' that treasure, eh? Just 'ead outta this hole and try to find yer way into the mansion.

lines.speaker: Mansion Guard
lines.line: Oi', you! Whatcha' think yer' doin' sneakin' around these parts? This be a restricted area! Yer' headed to the jail cell!

lines.speaker: Mansion Guard
lines.line: Aye', men! Tha' treasure has been stolen! Prepare the defenses!

lines.speaker: Mansion Guard
lines.line: Aye, we caught the nasty thief! We'll be lockin' him up till' he rots!

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Ah, I thought yer might be the first one back. Yer got a queenly look about ye...

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Head into the airship behind me, lassie. We'll wait a second for the others.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Move along, ya' got clearance to board the airship!

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Aha! I figured it'd be ye to win o'er the rest of that lot... Ye've earned the proper sovereignty of bein' our ruler, our queen of the Skyraiders.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Don't be worryin', we got this airship armoured somethin' heavy, and we're miles away from their cannons... Nothin' to be afraid of, we're safe in this ship.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: But, first things first, let’s take a look inside that fancy box ye got, see what mythical treasures lay guarded behind those grubby guardsmen, shall we?

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: By the skies and seas...

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: I hafta wonder now if this weren't bein' guarded for a bit of a nefarious reason. This be... Quite the weapon. It'd be deadly if this got used.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Well, thanks to ye, us Skyraiders might have it now, but using this weapon against civilization would be beyond terrible. We might be pirates but we ain't heartless!

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: I think we'll just have to keep this locked up nice n' tight once we get back. We'll be sure to tie this little cataclysm-in-a-box down much safer th'n those idiot men did.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Aha! Just gettin' back now. Let's head down and start the ceremony, shall we?

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: I am pleased to introduce our 734th Skyraider Queen. Fer the sake of our people, let her reign last more than two weeks.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: I, on behalf on the rest of the Skyraider people, have the honor of decoratin' you with the highest decoration of the Skyraiders, [The Queen’s Headpiece].

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Please use your sovereignty to lead us to the riches we deserve.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Yer Majesty. What an honour to have such a beautiful queen.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Now that ye've been crown, we must give ye the reward.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Benefits of being a queen I 'spose.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Please accept this, yer majesty.

lines.speaker: Trials Overseer
lines.line: Greetings, your majesty!

lines.speaker: Excited Fan
lines.line: Hmm... I might have just enough for one tier 3... Why are you standing there?

lines.speaker: Excited Fan
lines.line: I've been saving up for this scavenger hunt all year, there's no way I can lose!

lines.speaker: Scavenger Hunt Collector
lines.line: Tickets for sale! You! Would you like to join the great Siegfried Scavenger Hunt?

lines.speaker: Scavenger Hunt Collector
lines.line: You're back! Let me see your items.

lines.speaker: Scavenger Hunt Collector
lines.line: This... Wow, all of them? Let me take a look at these...

lines.speaker: Announcer
lines.line: Welcome, welcome everyone! We're only waiting on a few more people before we begin.

lines.speaker: Announcer
lines.line: Ah, there we go! I believe we're all set now.

lines.speaker: Announcer
lines.line: Welcome everyone, to the monthly SIEGFRIED FESTIVAL SCAVENGER HUNT!

lines.speaker: Announcer
lines.line: Today, we are once again celebrating the heroic deeds of Siegfried!

lines.speaker: Announcer
lines.line: All of you, my fellow gavellians, have adventured far and wide to gather rare items across the province.

lines.speaker: Announcer
lines.line: And yet, I cannot announce the winner...

lines.speaker: Announcer
lines.line: BECAUSE SIEGFRIED WILL!

lines.speaker: Siegfried Fan
lines.line: SIEEEGGFRIEED!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Hello, Citizens of Gavel!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Thank you all for participating in this fantastic scavenger hunt around Gavel!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: The winner of this hunt will have the privilege of going on a once-in-a-lifetime, fully authentic, adventure with me!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Now, without further ado: I shall announce the winner!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: And the winner is...

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Soldier!! Congratulations!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Soldier, please head to the backstage area to my right for your adventure. Thank you everyone!!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Welcome Soldier! Congratulations on winning the scavenger hunt!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Today, you'll be going with me on one of my glorious adventures.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: And to get there, we'll ride in the great Siegfried Airship!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: It's up at the airship docks - I'll teleport us there!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: TELEPORT!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Here, follow me onto the airship!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: And away we go!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Impressed by my piloting skills? Dodging these islands isn't a challenge at all for the mighty Siegfried!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: I rode an airship much like this one when I saved Ahmsord from the dragon.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Right now we're heading to a cave on the far east of the region.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: We'll have to navigate its treacherous corridors and defeat terrible beasts to get to the treasure at the end.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Why don't you go get my map from the upper level of the airship, and we'll get ready for our adventure.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: How much lon- Oh, you brought the map! Thanks.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: We'll need to use this map to navigate the dangerous cave we're going to.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: How did I get this? Well-er- I always prepare before my adventures!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Anyway, we're about to land now - be careful not to fall off!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Here we are, the great Cave of Treasure-Hoarding Evil Creatures!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Speak to me when you're fully prepared for this dangerous adventure.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: This cave is exceedingly dangerous, so make sure to follow my instructions.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: I've got decades of experience bravely adventuring in these caves, so I know what I'm doing.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Onwards! Soldier, stay right behind me!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: You sure took your time getting here! No matter.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: I adventure in caves such as these often to get rid of the evil beasts dwelling within.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: If it wasn't for me defeating them before they could even--

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Woah, stop! This might look like a harmless decoration, but it's a trap!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Aha! I'll protect you from the guardian, you deal with the rat!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Take THIS!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Ow- I mean, hah! That was easier than swatting a fly for the mighty Siegfried!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Seems like we're done here! That must have been a very difficult fight for you.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: The caves I adventure in are filled with terrifying beasts similar to those.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: WAIT! Don't move, that boulder is about to fall!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Wow, that was close! Of course, I saw that coming and had no risk at all.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: You might say that we can't go further, as it's blocking our way. But I can fix that!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: And no more boulder! Only one as powerful as I can do that.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: All we must do now is cross a perilous bridge over the Endless Chasm.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Aa, why did- Woah, careful! It looks like the bridge fell.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: But this is not such an obstacle as you might think, for I can, uh, jump over this chasm!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Here I go!
WAIT!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: The spell--

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: AAAAAAAAAAAAAH!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: AAAAAAGH!!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: You found something? Ok. I’ll... follow you then.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: WHAT WAS THAT SOUND?! A- are you sure we should go into there?

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: MY ARM! IT HIT MY ARM!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: ... I think I can manage.. OW!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: You.. You got us out of there!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: I didn't think we'd ever find a way out of there...

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: ... Well, I guess we should keep going. M- Maybe there's a way out?

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: L- Look! There's plants and light up ahead! A WAY OUT!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Come on, follow me!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: AAAH!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: W- What just happened?! I'm trapped in here!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: ... It's... some sort of trap. I can feel the ground heating up!!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: T-that was terrifying... Y-you saved my life. Thank you, Soldier... I wasn't prepared for real danger like this.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: ...What? Houses, and a well? All the way down here?

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: It's... empty. And the houses sure don't look like anyone's lived here for.. centuries.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: ... Is this the food you found?

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: I guess it's... the best that could be found here. You say you cooked it yourself?

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: I'll give it a try, then. Doubt there's anything better around here.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: These are... amazing!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Thank you, Soldier! I feel much better, I can head deeper as soon as you're ready.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: ... Was this a sandwich at some point?

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: It barely has any resemblance to one.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Well... I doubt there’s anything better around here. I- I’ll take it.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: OW!! I think I broke my teeth! This is like eating stone!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: ... I th-ow-ink I’m ready to- ow- move on. Let’s get go-oow-ing.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: You know... my name is actually Gurix.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Sounds extremely Corkian, I know. They made me use Siegfried because it sounds less foreign, I suppose.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: AAAH! Get away!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: OW! Soldier, I think this web is poisoned! Quick, get me out with one of your spells!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Thank you, Soldier. I'll.. I'll follow you from now on. Clearly you're more prepared than I am.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Soldier? I think that giant web there is being held up by the platforms on the walls.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: I think... Maybe you can cut them down? I'll stay here, I think it's the safest place. I'll call for you if a spider webs me again.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: You did it! The web fell!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Let's head onwards, I don't want to deal with any more spiders.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Hey, wait up! Thanks for saving me there.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Ok, I'll wait here. Tell me when to follow you again.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Hm.. I'll bet you an emerald these tiles are trapped.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: What are these little green thingies? Soldier, try right-clicking one and see what happens.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Woah, I think the other tiles got activated when you disarmed that one!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: I think that tile's disarmed! Let's head onwards!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Hmm.. I think I see how these work.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: So if I use this button...

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: It disarms the tile! Here, I'll disarm the next one!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: And now this one!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: AAH! That burns!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Well.. I think I see now. It's a bad idea to disarm one of the same type that you're standing on.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Well.. you try these out. Tell me when to follow you further.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Ok, lead the way. Tell me when to stop following.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: ... This temple is... Sort of fascinating, honestly.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: It feels similar to the ruins back above, but... Better, uh...better preserved. Maybe those faded over the millenia?

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: ... Hmm. Clearly there's a path further in that direction.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: soldier, look! That could be a teleporter to the other side!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: It's... surrounded by those tiles. I don't think I'll live if another hits me... Tell me when to follow you.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Soldier, I think I know what these are for! If we activate both at once, the teleporter might start up! I'll stay at one, and activate it as soon as you activate the other.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: I've activated mine, let's see if this works!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Hey, don't use the teleporter without me!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Soldier, it worked!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: I.. I honestly didn't think the teleporter would still work. The ancient villagers' magic must have been really powerful.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: .. Let's keep going, then. I think I can see something up ahead.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Another town? Or another part of the same one? I'm not sure..

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: This one even seems to have a forge and a tailor.. It was a full, proper village!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: That.. is that sunlight?

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Soldier, look! I can see the sky from here! M- maybe there's a way to get up!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: I think.. what if we can use this geyser somehow? It looks dormant, but I feel like we can activate it again.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: You take a look around, I'll be resting a little. I don't think I've ever walked this much in my life...

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Woah! The geyser's active!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: W-Wait.. that'll be quite a long fall after we get launched up. Can you try making some safety equipment, like a parachute or some really soft boots?

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: You've already made something? Let me see.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: This looks... usable? It's something, at least.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: Probably the best we'll get down here. Are you sure you don't need anything for yourself? No? Okay.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: I can't wait to see the look on their faces when we get back. We've just saved the legacy of Siegfried!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: WOAH! The parachute worked!

lines.speaker: Beacon
lines.line: Teleport Activation Successful! Exit teleporter is now active.

lines.speaker: Teleporter
lines.line: Teleport Successful!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Hey, wait for me! Le- Let's work together here.

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: W-we made it? ...soldier, WE DID IT! WE'RE BACK! HAHAAA! I'M ALIVE!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Hello there! It is I, Siegfried, and I just stopped the threat that was this cave!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Hah, that's a great costume you have there! Looks just like me!

lines.speaker: Gurix
lines.line: What? I- I've been REPLACED?!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Hah, don't mind that jokester over there. He does have an impressive costume though!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Look over there! Those must be fireworks to celebrate my victory!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Well, anyways! You had a really bad fall in that cave there. I carried you out myself, you must've had some wild hallucinations.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Even though it was your own mistake, I'll return you the emeralds you spent on the scavenger hunt.. and some more as compensation. That'll be.. [5 Liquified Emeralds]!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: I must return to Ahmsord for the celebration now. Perhaps we will meet again at the next scavenger hunt!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Hello there, human! It is I, Siegfried! You must have just missed how I expertly ended the threat of this monster-ridden cave!

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Soldier, I'm glad to see you managed to get out alive. That must have been quite a fall into the chasm.

lines.speaker: Siegfried
lines.line: Of course, I got out easily using my spells and great knowledge of caves! Well, I must be off now. Maybe we may meet again if you win the next scavenger hunt!
As compensation for your unfortunate accident, Siegfried will return you the emeralds spent on purchasing scavenger hunt items, and some more as compensation.
That should amount to... 5 Liquid Emeralds. We apologize for the difficulties you encountered during your adventure with Siegfried, The Hero of Gavel!

lines.speaker: Scavenger Hunt Collector
lines.line: Come back next month, maybe you'll win again! Who knows what glorious adventure Siegfried will take the next winner on?

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: ... soldier? Is that you? It's been a while, heh. You know, we were actually looking for someone like you. Come on, follow me.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Hmm, you might just be exactly what we're looking for. If you want to join a top secret mission, follow me.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Elphie! Have you found our fourth member yet?... Oh, soldier!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I... Am surprised to see you here. Looks like we’ve both come a long way.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Can you get a move on, please? We got our spare, let’s go!

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Hold up. We need to brief soldier. This mission is dangerous. Listen up.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Hundreds of years ago, people mined the surrounding areas around Detlas.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: They eventually broke through to an entirely undiscovered area of the Wynn province.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: What they found... Was not good. It was cursed. Not corrupted... This was something else.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: No one really knows what’s beyond the mine because it was sealed to prevent the spread of a new threat.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: We don’t have much intel, but it’s been named by some as the Silent Expanse.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Lately, creatures of darkness have been seeping through, and we think they are from the expanse.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: The existence of this place has been kept on a strict need-to-know basis.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Our mission is to make our way through the mine, observe and report the threat level.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Come on, we need to get going! Enough with the meetings!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: How many times do we have to tell you to stop doing that? Fix it, Lucio.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Fine...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: soldier, if you're ready, let's go.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Everyone ready? I'll lead.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: It’s a twist of fate that our paths have converged here, soldier. We started our journey together and now..

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Aledar...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I hear them too.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Ah, no problem. I'll take care of these.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: No more running for us, huh soldier? Ah, we're here.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: This is actually our second attempt. The first time, it didn’t go too well.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: We have more numbers now, Lucio and yourself should help us overpower it.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Can't be that strong, bet I can take it myself.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: We managed to seal it in, but with the 4 of us I'm sure we ca-

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Let's just do it!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Wait... No!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Lucio! You FOOL!

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: What’s the big deal? You said yourself we can take it!

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Ouch...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: We need a PLAN.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: The plan is attack!

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Argh!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Lucio!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Ahh!

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: No! Stop hurting them!

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Ouch! This isn't working...

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Is it just me or are our attacks doing NOTHING?

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Lucio's right! Change of plan. Lucio, help me hold it in place.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Aledar, you know what to do.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: soldier, come with me! Cast a spell to block the cave's entrance so the monster can't leave.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I'll block it from attacking, you block it up with a spell.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: They won’t be able to hold it for long.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Ready?! Cast any spell!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Lucio, Elphaba! Run!

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: We all here? Where’s Lucio?

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Guys... Any help? I'm stuck!

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Phew, here. Let me get you out.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: I'm sorry, team. I've never seen a monster like that before.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: It looks like our problem isn't firepower. It's something else. It's like our weapons just didn't affect it at all.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I know someone who might be able to help us. A blacksmith on Black Road.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: soldier, I've written the house's coordinates on your book. Meet us there.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Just in time. We're all here.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: It looks like the Blacksmith knows what's wrong..

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: So, Dren. Do you know why we can't damage the beast?

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: Certainly! Your issue is elemental. As you know, there are 5 elements...

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: Earth...

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: Fire...

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: Air...

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: Water...

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: And Thunder...

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: But.. There is a hidden element, ❂ Darkness .

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: In order to damage a creature of Darkness, you must remove that influence from your soul.

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: Some Dark creatures use a sort of synchronous barrier that prevents them being harmed by other creatures influenced with Darkness.

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: In order to purify you, I will need 2 powerful items.

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: Firstly, a shard from a Dernic Beast. There is one living in the depths of the Roots of Corruption.

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: I will use this to reveal the darkness element in you all.

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: And then, of course, a Light item, to purify all of you...

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Wait... what do you mean a Light item?

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: Something from any Light creature would work, you could get some dust from Gavel fairies if you wanted.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Alright. Aledar, you get the Darkness item with soldier, and I'll go get the Light item with Lucio.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Yes ma'am! Let's go soldier!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Here we are, the roots of Corruption. Let's go, soldier!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: We found that the caves around the roots are far more complex than we thought...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: There's one with far more powerful creatures... Somewhere... Here!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: What are you waiting for? Let's go!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: ...I don't think we can spell our way across, soldier! We need something like... Wings!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I've never used wings like this before...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I think if we just hold them and walk normally, it should help us glide across.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Don't drop them and don't get hit by the lava geysers, obviously.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Don't forget why we're here, we're looking for a creature of darkness. Shout for me if you find one.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: That's our target! Go after it!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Wait, why isn't it fighting us here? Careful! It might be trapped!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Wow, I'm impressed soldier. I honestly thought you would need my help.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Well, we got what we came for. Let's head back to Dren.

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: Looks like we lucked out on this one. Did you get an item of darkness?

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: That should do it. Let's see if this will work. Come here soldier!

lines.speaker: Dren
lines.line: It's done! You ought to be free of the dark influence. You ought to be able to break through that barrier that was giving you trouble.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Are you sure? I don't feel that different. Well.. I guess there's only one way to find out.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Everyone here? Great! Time to finish what I started!

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Lucio! No! When will you learn?

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Right, yes. Sorry, what's the plan?

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: We don't want that thing to escape, it could cause widespread panic.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: We'll open up a small entrance to get in, and fight it once inside.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Fine...

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Let's go!

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: We... We actually did it!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Thank grook for that. I was wondering if we'd ever be rid of this nightmare.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: We have an extremely old map of the mines to help us, but we have no idea what's waiting for us.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I want to warn you, this may well be a one way ticket for all of us.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Yeah right! Check this out!

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Rocks are one thing, Lucio. The creatures we're about to face require more than brute strength. You need force of mind.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Oh my. Maybe this isn't the best idea.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: It's too late now. We've got to finish this mission.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Remember the goal Elphie, we must reach the end of the expanse.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: It's still empty here. But it looks like they were here only yesterday.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: I thought you said the miners were here hundreds of years ago?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: They were. I don't know why it would be so well preserved. It's as if nothing has touched it.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: According to the documents, we need to make our way to the end of the road.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Argh! Bugs! Get off!

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: So much for nothing being here.

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Why are they only going for me?

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Aledar, how far is it to the end?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I read the same map as you. It didn't even have scale. There should be a bridge ahead, though.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Uhh... A destroyed one. And it wasn't cause I blew it up this time!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Hmm, well we'll have to go around.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: This doesn't really look like corruption, does it?

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Uhhh... I'm not feeling really wel-... Aahhh!

lines.speaker: Elphaba
lines.line: Aaahhh! My liver! It took my liver!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Elphaba! No! It's an illusion!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Where has she gone?! ELPHABA?

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Aledar, maybe we should just double back now?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Elphaba is an extremely able warrior. We will fight on and find her.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Do you really think it was just an illusion?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I'm not sure. I hope so.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: What if we're infected too? Shouldn't we just go back?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: We can't, Lucio! We have a mission, as you very well know. We continue.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Besides, we might be carrying some of those things too. We can't risk them infesting Wynn.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Looks like we need to go around to the right, here?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: It feels like something's watching us...

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Aledar, what is this place? You didn’t tell me there was a city here.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: There is. A big one, too; there's more ahead. But it doesn't look like anyone’s home. The map doesn't have a name for it either.

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Wait a sec, is that one of the miners? Is she hurt? HEEEEY! YOU OVER THERE!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Lucio, no! It's a trap!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: LUCIO! Don't get closer!

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: Wait, what's going on? Why can't I move?!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: No no no!! This is bad, really bad! We have to go soldier! Now!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: We can't stay here.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Who's that?! Elphaba?! Lucio?!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Wait, you're just one of the miners. This doesn't feel like an illusion...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Look, you need to get out of here. It's not safe- Wait, what's that noise...?
OURGURGH!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: AAHHHHHHH!

lines.speaker: Lucio
lines.line: soldier! She was completely right. You ought to come with us...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: soldier! soldier!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I think my leg is broken. I have a potion to fix it, but I dropped it back up there.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I feel a bit better.. But something's still wrong.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Let's just get out of here, soldier on. There's only one way out.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Jump with me, come on!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Aaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhh!!!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Urrrgh. soldier, this hasn't gone to plan. According to my map we aren't even half way.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I can't walk. But equally we can't stay here.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: The mission must be carried out. The plan has changed, but it's imperative we get to the end of this expanse, together.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: There has to be a way.. Even if you have to push me in this thing!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: No, I'm not joking. You guard the cart, I'll lead the way.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: According to the map, the miners started a town a little ahead.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Who knows what's left, but it’s got to be safer than here.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I think the Small Monsters will try to Kill me.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: While the Big Monsters will try to Kill you.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: It's going to be on you to make sure we both get through this.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: The fate of the mission relies on the two of us working together.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Are those... Eyes on the trees?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Look out, soldier!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Watch out, the small monsters are coming for me! I can’t fight in this thing!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Another one's coming! Pay attention!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Great job! It looks like they've stopped coming. Let's keep going.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: They're here again, soldier!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: A lot of those small ones are coming for me!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: This one was close! We're getting close to the town.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: We'll have to stop again! We can't go past so many monsters.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: We're almost there! I can see the town from here!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Oh no!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Great job! It looks like they've stopped coming. Let's keep going.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Finally, we've arrived... It's not exactly the town on the map.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: The lost miners are here... How? they must be hundreds of years old!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: What is this obelisk? It's.. oddly comforting. I recognise this feeling from my time in Gavel.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Maybe.. It's been touched by the light? If so.. It could heal me.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Let's see if it does anything to me...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: It worked... Kind of. I feel at least 70%. We still have a ways to go.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Let’s take some time to gather ourselves before we press on. I’ll meet you on the other side of town.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Ouch! I got hit! Be careful, soldier!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Alright, let's go. I'll tell you more about our journey on the way.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: We should try to follow the path as closely as we can. You lead, I'll follow.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Stop! Did you hear that?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: It's an ambush! Stay sharp, soldier!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Good work. Seems that killing the king made the other creatures run off. We're lucky about that-

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Wait, soldier, what's going on? Are you alright?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Oh, no no no! I have a potion for this, where is it, where is it, aha! Here, drink!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: One of those things must have infected your wounds... Everything in this area looks completely hazardous and sickening.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I expected the worst, so I tried to bring anything and everything that might help. Let's keep moving.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: LOOK OUT!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: soldier, a-agh...you're okay, right?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I'm... I'm going to lead us for now. At least for a little...while... I can't have you g-getting-

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: GAH!! AAAGH!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: ...urgh... I...sorry. I just... I need a moment.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: soldier, you just... you have to realize, I can't have you getting hurt.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I want to stress this... We NEED to get to the end of this path, together.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Hrk... Ugh, dizzy...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Okay. I'm as good as I can get right now. Let's move.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Ah? What... What just... Why do I...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I'll be fine, I just...why did I feel so empty all of the sudden...?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Oh no, I think something is coming... soldier! Fight it off, I don't think I can defend myself right now!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Huff... Not feeling totally better, but... At least I can still defend myself.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: My stomach is empty, I can't even vomit... Why do I still feel so dizzy? Maybe a potion will help...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Hm. No, not that one...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Urgh, pfft! My vomit tasted better than that coming up...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Hah...that's the ticket. Which potion was this anyways... ...hair loss treatment? Why did THAT work?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Though, you saw what happened to that beast I attacked? Follow me.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: This, from what I recall of the mission statements, is referred to as a “Void Hole.” It's a sort of portal.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: They connect to each other in odd ways, but we saw the beast come out of that one when I knocked it in, so...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Watch. I'll come out the other side.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Alright, good! It does connect up consistently, at least. You try now.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I bring this up because if we're seeing one, we'll be seeing more soon. You'll need to adjust yourself to the sight of them.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: You lead again, please.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: We grossly underestimated the difficulties we would have here. And, by that, I mean myself, Elphie, and Lucio did...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: We were each unprepared and cocky. If it weren't for you, I'd be dead now, for what it's worth.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I wasn't certain at first about you coming along, but you've more than shown you were the right one for the job.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: ...I had to figure this map was outdated. This wall of spikes isn't listed on it, and the path goes through here!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I'll have to assume they're new...and if they're new, I might be able to bash through them.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: soldier, try throwing a spell at the same time! Let's crack through these things!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: ...aagh... I... H-how are these so resilient...?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I'm an idiot... I nearly killed myself trying that. I nearly ruined the mission...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I'm sorry, but you'll have to go without me. I can't move another step for now.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: There's a lot of void holes around here, remember my warning... You can probably get past these spikes with one.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: If I'd been thinking I would have suggested it earlier... Once you're past, we'll...uh. We'll do something.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Just...be careful where you go. The void holes could lead anywhere. They might lead you someplace very, very dangerous, too dangerous even for you. I pray they won't...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: There's a void hole right there to try out first. Get going, now. You have to do this.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: ...wait, soldier? You got to the other side then...? Good...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I don't know what you did, but whatever it was, it's made cracks in the spikes that I can see from this side.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I've got some of my energy back...let's try spellcasting again. If we do it at the same time, we might make some headway.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I won't crack my skull open on the spikes again though. Promise.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: You lead. I'll cast my spell as soon as I hear yours.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Thank god it worked... That's our destination there, the Eldritch Outlook.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Now comes the hardest part... Come along. I'll need you there for it.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: That blade there...it's made for sacrifice. See how that gate is shut?

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: In order to open the doors to the Outlook, we need to sacrifice a powerful soul.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: If you haven't gotten it already, the plan was to sacrifice our fourth. It's why I was hesitant about having you come along, though it was perfect.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Think about it. A soldier with no relations, no loved ones, and no way to deny their fate. But...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I've been mulling it over since we got to the town... You'll sacrifice me instead. I won't take no for an answer.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I mean...look at the state I'm in, soldier! I'm on death's door already, and you've proven yourself far stronger than I am even at my best.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Here. You can take everything I had on me. My emeralds, and the key to the dungeon. I certainly won't be able to use them anymore.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Upon the top of the tower is... Well, something. We don't know for certain what it is, but it will prevent you from passing through.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: You'll have to kill it to break the barrier. But...find other soldiers who can help you. It will be impossible to defeat alone.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: ...no more putting it off, then. I'm bleeding out.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Grab the blade, soldier.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Now...strike me down. My soul will unlock the gate...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Agh... Don't worry...a-about me...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: You...can do this. I know y-you can.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: Gah... D-Destroy it...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: The monster w-watching us...

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: AAAAGH!!
1/1theeye

lines.speaker: Lutho Citizen
lines.line: Wait... It can't be. Look me in the eyes. You're human, like me.

lines.speaker: Lutho Citizen
lines.line: Ahh.. A newcomer! Welcome, welcome!

lines.speaker: Lutho Citizen
lines.line: It's been quite some time since a new face has shown up here.

lines.speaker: Lutho Citizen
lines.line: I can't see why anyone would choose to stay there.
Hello soldier.
I am you.
You are me.
We are one.
Not here, though.
The Obelisk offers us different paths.
It offers to protect me, while leaving you in reality.
If you want to return as one, you must heed my words.
I may not be able to speak in the physical realm...
But your actions... Your deeds... They shape me, hurt me, heal me.
Choose our path wisely.

lines.speaker: Lutho Guard
lines.line: If you really want to leave, no one is stopping you. Except maybe yourself.
Something is holding us back.
You must keep going.
We must keep going.
Are you sure we want to face reality?
The only one holding us back is us.

lines.speaker: Lutho Citizen
lines.line: You- you chose to come back. I saw your eyes disappear, briefly.
???: ...you arrive. You search... To what end?

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: We destroy Ragni today. The great fortress will fall.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: I will find their protector, Bob. You each will engage the guards and city dwellers. 10 citizens.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: If each of you kills 10 citizens, then the city will run empty. So, you shall make it run empty.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Go!
???: You anger. Viewing needless destruction. To what end?

lines.speaker: Amadel
lines.line: Hey, little miss. Don't go spacing out on me like that.

lines.speaker: Citizen
lines.line: Oh, yeah I saw the mayor not too long ago.

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.line: You are here for the job, aren't you? I have to apologize. It's going to be trickier than I'd wanted for you.

lines.speaker: Bodyguard
lines.line: No one enters when the mayor is doing his errands, sorry. You'll have to wait for your transaction.

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.line: Can you see the mayor? I had to stay totally out of sight while setting this all up, so...

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.line: Quickly, back to the camp. Before we're noticed.

lines.speaker: Amadel
lines.line: Aha, you two are back.

lines.speaker: Amadel
lines.line: Is everything taken care of?

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.line: Yes sir, everything went smoothly, soldier did a great thing for the company.
???: ...you rage. Aided the ignoble. To what end?

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: You have been made for a single purpose, peon. The wizard, Theorick, is endangering our cause.

lines.speaker: Kotham
lines.line: Listen, I understand the discontent, but we must start rationing! The corruption is consuming our arable fields.

lines.speaker: Kotham
lines.line: Who knows if we'll even have water soon? We need to save up as much as we can!

lines.speaker: Citizen
lines.line: Yeah, and what does Theorick have to say on the topic? How will he think of that?

lines.speaker: Citizen
lines.line: He will be here shortly to discuss this problem in more detai-

lines.speaker: Theorick
lines.line: Everyone, hush and listen to what Kotham is saying!

lines.speaker: Theorick
lines.line: As the mayor said, all of you need to start rationing what you eat and drink. I cannot be here every waking moment!

lines.speaker: Theorick
lines.line: In addition, I've figured something very important out. I'm developing a way to cease the spread of corruption. So I need to concentrate on that.

lines.speaker: Theorick
lines.line: ...hm. Something... Something is off.

lines.speaker: Theorick
lines.line: ...someone among you... I can feel a horrendous strength...

lines.speaker: Theorick
lines.line: Kotham! Get everyone to safety! NOW! MOVE, GO!

lines.speaker: Theorick
lines.line: You! Sent by Bak'al, I assume? What, is he too much of a coward to face me himself?

lines.speaker: Theorick
lines.line: What purpose do you have for doing this? This destruction is needless! Nesaak and all of Wynn have suffered enough!

lines.speaker: Theorick
lines.line: I'll freeze you solid, just like the rest of the corruption, you foul THING!

lines.speaker: Theorick
lines.line: This way, no one else gets hurt. Only one will leave from here alive.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: The Twains fall away. The peon has done its job well.
???:: ...you fear. Does the dark become you?

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Peon. You have been created for one purpose. You will ensure the fall of Troms.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Defend yourself. He is too far gone to control. You will be attacked.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Move faster. He will notice your presence soon.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: The Corrupteds are malleable. Create some kind of bridge with them. Answer how for yourself.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: The Corrupter is awake. And he is close. Move, peon! You still must break the seal.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: I am unfamiliar with Twain magic. Use the intellect I have given you. Break the seal.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Your job is done... And you survived. I will save you for another mission, should I need you. Now...watch.
???: ...you disbelieve. It was an end. But you are here once more.

lines.speaker: Scientist Urelix
lines.line: Ah, here for the job opportunity then, I see. The waiver didn't turn you away, good!

lines.speaker: Dr. Urelix
lines.line: Good job! We'll get you taken care of nicely.

lines.speaker: Dr. Urelix
lines.line: Good job, let us get down to my lab.

lines.speaker: Leni
lines.line: A bit of spare change, for an old man out of work?

lines.speaker: Kohma
lines.line: Oh, ah...heehee, heya cutie.. Whatcha doin' all the way out here?

lines.speaker: Kohma
lines.line: Heya, again. Thinking of it, a lovely one like you is probably spoken for already, huh?

lines.speaker: Kohma
lines.line: W-wait, those are...for me? Oh, you shouldn't have, I'm so happy!

lines.speaker: Anast
lines.line: Agh, dang it dang it dang it!! You over there, help me out, would ya??

lines.speaker: Dr. Urelix
lines.line: I'll take care of this homeless old man.

lines.speaker: Dr. Urelix
lines.line: Well done! We'll get you taken care of nicely.

lines.speaker: Urelix
lines.line: Flawless work! I daresay these are some of our best work yet, and it's thanks to you.

lines.speaker: Urelix
lines.line: Go on, step closer! You've done a wonderful service here. Examine the fruits of your labor!

lines.speaker: Urelix
lines.line: Look into their eyes, it's almost like you can see the person they once were. Intriguing, isn't-

lines.speaker: Urelix
lines.line: Hah! This one seems quite fond of you! Want to take it home as a bonus to your payment?
???:: ...you resign yourself. You believe you will never find the answers you seek.

lines.speaker: Royal Advisor
lines.line: Our king has requested the removal of the slum folk.

lines.speaker: Citizen
lines.line: A King's messenger, hm? What are your kind doing here?

lines.speaker: Royal Advisor
lines.line: As expected... Well, the King's orders are orders. They must be followed, but...
???:: ...once again. You wonder. To what end?

lines.speaker: Corkian Security Overseer
lines.line: Not even the most remote tower of this castle is left unguarded! Unless it's lunch time, of course...

lines.speaker: Antikythera Supercomputer
lines.line: AH, GOOD. I LIKE THE LOOKS OF THIS ONE. I WILL HAVE TO THANK WHOEVER MADE THIS MECH.

lines.speaker: Teleportation Mech
lines.line: BEGIN TRANSMISSION: REALLY, WHO’S SO STUPID AS TO LEAVE A CATAPULT AIMED AT YOUR ALLIES?

lines.speaker: Teleportation Mech
lines.line: Scan complete. Object located.

lines.speaker: Avos Chief
lines.line: I'm... in shock. We aid them in destroying their factory, and...

lines.speaker: Avos Chief
lines.line: Round up the defenses and sharpen the spears. There is no excuse for this.
No, wait! Hold on!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Chieftain! We noticed the same thing as you did and I promise you, it was not us who did this.

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Maxie! There is no more 'both sides' here! This is not your people tearing up the earth, this is your people making attempts on our lives!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: No, I swear this wasn't planned! I'm on the city council now! There's got to be another explanation. There's still mechs around, it could have been one of them!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: And what would those monstrosities be taking orders from now? Your factory is shut down, as it ought to be!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: I'll investigate this myself. There’s got to be some other explanation! Please, hold off on the war preparations!

lines.speaker: Teleportation Mech
lines.line: BEGIN TRANSMISSION: THAT WOULD HAVE BEEN ALL WE NEEDED TO DO, IF NOT FOR SOMEONE INTERFERING. YOU DID YOUR JOB PERFECTLY, MECH PL-4Y.

lines.speaker: Teleportation Mech
lines.line: Retrieving Mech PL-4Y.

lines.speaker: Teleportation Mech
lines.line: Sending Mech PL-4Y to Next objective location...

lines.speaker: Corkus Citizen
lines.line: WHAT IS THAT!? THE AVOS ARE ATTACKING?

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: They listened to me... right? Why's this-

lines.speaker: Citizen
lines.line: What in the world...? That's Avos magic!

lines.speaker: Citizen
lines.line: Why're they attacking us? This is on a way bigger scale than finding grape vines in my laundry machine!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Don't panic! I'll talk to the Chieftain. There's been some kind of mistake here, I'm certain of it!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Chief! I thought I asked you to put away the war drums!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: We HAVE, Maxie. Do not make accusations upon us, on our own land.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Corkus City was attacked today! A magical root broke through our wall. This is nature magic, an Avos specialty!

lines.speaker: Avos Chieftain
lines.line: Hm. Convenient, that one of our prized ceremonial totems has gone missing. You may be right that someone is attempting to cause insurgence.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: I knew this was some kind of mistake. I'll get to the bottom of this!

lines.speaker: Teleportation Mech
lines.line: BEGIN TRANSMISSION: THERE’S AN ANNOYING WRENCH IN THE WORKS. YOU’VE BEEN DOING YOUR JOB PERFECTLY, MECH PL-4Y.

lines.speaker: Teleportation Mech
lines.line: THERE IS A SET OF STATISTICALLY INFERIOR MECHS BUILT BY THE CORKIANS IN THIS TOWER. I HAVE A SET OF SYSTEMS PROGRAMMED IN THIS DEVICE.

lines.speaker: Corkus Guard
lines.line: Bzzt... Hello World.NEW ENEMY REGISTERED: AVOS. Proceed with attack protocol- click.

lines.speaker: Teleportation Mech
lines.line: BEGIN TRANSMISSION: YOUR JOB IS OVER, MECH PL-4Y. I HESITATE TO SAY YOU DID A GOOD JOB, BECAUSE THE JOB WAS ANYTHING BUT GOOD. IT WAS NECESSARY THOUGH.

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: I knew it! It was such a longshot, but I knew the Factory still had to be at large! And now I have evidence to prove it, too!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: This time we'll make sure you won't get another chance. I'll tell everyone what happened, and then we’ll tear that factory down at the foundations!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: You should've picked a more private meeting place! I'm out!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: FREEZE!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: Aah, you’re fast! You caught up this quick?! I have no other choice...

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: You aren't going to stop me from getting to the battleground! You look like you were scrounged up from rust and verdigris!

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: You have defeated both of my most powerful creations...

lines.speaker: Maxie
lines.line: No... I... have to tell them.
???:: ...you harden your heart. There is no end, you think.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Detlas. What a foolish place for a central trading town, so close to the Roots.

lines.speaker: Admiral Aegis
lines.line: Halt! Who goes there? Stop, in the name of the Detlas army!

lines.speaker: Aegis
lines.line: Should you continue, you shall face the strength and courage of Admiral Aegis!

lines.speaker: Guard
lines.line: Admiral?! It's Bak'al!

lines.speaker: Aegis
lines.line: We cannot back down against any foe! Chaaaarge!!

lines.speaker: Guard
lines.line: ...r-reinforcements! Need reinforcements!

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: The strongest of Detlas' army is dead. The rest are hiding in fear. Detlas will fall.
Excuse me, I think you're forgetting someone.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: ...Fool. Run while you have the chance.
Detlas will not fall today. We'll be making sure of that!

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: We?

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Self-confident idiots. I won't even bother dealing with you two.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Peon. Deal with this nonsense.

lines.speaker: Tasim
lines.line: ...no sense screaming for the dead. But do you think I'm going to just give up like that?

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: It would be easier on yourself to.

lines.speaker: Tasim
lines.line: Hah. Didn't know corrupteds had a sense of humor, twisted as it might be.

lines.speaker: Tasim
lines.line: I won't dare die while everything here is at stake.

lines.speaker: Tasim
lines.line: How's this, then, hm? Think your PEON can handle me at my strongest?

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Yes. I do. A foolhardy show of power means nothing.

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Finish this.

lines.speaker: Tasim
lines.line: I AM NOT GIVING UP!

lines.speaker: Tasim
lines.line: Airforce! Drop the bomb!

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: TASIM! How the hell did you manage to kill him?!

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: You take too much stock in your ability. My victory is inevitable.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: I'll tear your guts out!!

lines.speaker: Bak'al
lines.line: Your attention should be drawn to my peon. Now fall.

lines.speaker: Aledar
lines.line: This isn't over! Once your little lackey's dead I'm coming after you!!
???:: And so, you have reached an end.
???:: However. Though the change is irrevocable...

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: PRICK.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: IF I HAD A MOVABLE NECK, I'D BE TWISTING IT AROUND TO FACE YOU WITH UTTER CONFUSION.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WHAT IN THE NAME OF ALL THAT IS HOLY IS GOING THROUGH YOUR HEAD?! WE'RE MILES FROM THE SKY ISLANDS!! WHERE IS THIS PLACE?!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ... STAIRWAY TO HEAVEN, HUH? I DON'T KNOW ABOUT YOU, BUT I DON'T GET THE APPEAL.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: OH, HEY, THIS PLACE IS NICE! IT HAS EVERYTHING A PLACE COULD NEED! MUSHROOMS, COZY HOUSES, BEINGS OF GREAT POWER...

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: SO, WHAT IS THIS PLACE? IS IT A BRIDGE, OR IS IT A TOWN? MAKE UP YOUR DAMN MIND, VILLAGERS!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOW, REAL GRAND CITY HERE, HUH? THIS PLACE IS HUGE! AND PROBABLY A MESS TO NAVIGATE, REALLY POORLY DESIGNED IF YOU THINK ABOUT IT.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ... WOW. I'M... I'M ACTUALLY SHOCKED.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HEY, THIS PLACE HAS GOT SOME NICE LOOKING CAPS! DROP ME OFF HERE!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WAIT, I'VE HEARD OF THIS PLACE. TIME GOES SLOWER HERE, DOESN'T IT?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WHY IS IT SO HOT IN HERE? OH, YOU HAD BETTER NOT BE THINKING WHAT I THINK YOU'RE THINKING! I'M NOT GONNA BE A ROASTED MUSHROOM TODAY!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: I KNOW THESE CANYON EGGS GET LARGE BUT I HAVE TO ASK, HOW DID THE BIRD FIT IN HERE TO MANAGE THIS?!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: Y-YOU CAN'T BE SERIOUS. YOU... YOU SHOULDN'T BE HERE. I LOST THAT KEY A LONG TIME AGO, BUT SOMEHOW... YOU FOUND IT AND MADE YOUR WAY HERE. RIGHT, LET ME EXPLAIN.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HAHA, LOOK! YOU'RE PRACTICALLY ONE OF THEM, YOU FIT RIGHT IN! NOW STAY HERE LIKE A GOOD ANIMAL AND LET ME GO MY OWN WAY.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: A TREE GUARDIAN? SERIOUSLY?! THAT'S ABOUT AS BELIEVABLE AS A TALKING MUSH...OH WAIT. HUH. CARRY ON.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WAIT, YOU'RE ACTUALLY FALLING FOR THIS STUFF? SERIOUSLY?! IT'S CLEARLY JUST A BUNCH OF SEEDS PAINTED GOLD, ARE YOU QUITE LITERALLY BLIND?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ...AND I HAD THOUGHT SOME OF YOUR PREVIOUS LOONEY ADVENTURES HAD INDICATED YOU WERE A BUNBLING IDIOT, BUT YOU'VE REALLY OUTDONE YOURSELF... WHERE EVEN ARE WE?!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HEY HEY HEY, WHERE DO YOU THINK YOU'RE GOING? THERE'S A BOUNTY ON MY HEAD HERE SINCE... THE INCIDENT... CAN YOU JUST AVOID THIS PLACE LIKE YOU AVOID MY ADVICE?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: OH NO. WHAT DID THAT BUTTON DO? WHAT DID THE BUTTON DO? DID YOU BREAK IT? I BET YOU BROKE IT!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: I'M GONNA BE STUCK WITH YOU FOREVER, AREN'T I? MAY AS WELL THROW ME IN ONE OF THOSE GRAVES RIGHT NOW!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: OI, WHY'RE YOU TAKING ME ALL THE WAY OUT HERE? MY COUSIN LIVES HERE, I HATE HIM!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: *GASP* *PANT* IS THERE ZERO AIR UP HERE? GET ME DOWN THIS INSTANT! OR IS YOUR BRAIN SO TINY IT DOESN'T NEED OXYGEN TO SURVIVE?!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HEY NUMBSKULL, LEAVE ME HERE, ALRIGHT? I SAW SOME NICE CAPS OVER THERE.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: BRILLIANT. ABSOLUTELY BRILLIANT! HOW BRAINDEAD ARE YOU?! THERE'S NOTHING HERE!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WHO KNEW BEING EATEN ALIVE BY A FIRE-BREATHING DRAGON IS BETTER THAN BEING STUCK WITH YOU?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: URGH, WHAT IS THAT AWFUL STENCH?! IT'S ALMOST OVERPOWERING YOUR OWN RANCIDNESS! I MEAN, DO YOU EVER BATHE?!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ARGH, I'M CURSED, I SWEAR IT! EVEN THE SWEET RELEASE OF DEATH HASN'T GOTTEN ME AWAY FROM YOU! YOU'RE LIKE A COCKROACH!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: YOU KNOW WHAT, TO HECK WITH THIS! I'M BAILING, SEE YA LATER! HAVE A TERRIBLE LIFE, YOU INGRATE!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HOW DID YOU MANAGE TO GET ME TO SOMEPLACE DARKER THAN THE INSIDE OF YOUR SATCHEL? WHAT, DID YOU CRAWL UP SOMETHING'S-

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: OH GREAT, ANOTHER ONE. JUST FANTASTIC. WHAT'S WITH THE FACE, HUH? NEVER SEEN A TALKING MUSHROOM BEFORE? GO AWAY!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: OH MY, LOOK WHO'S BACK. HERE I THOUGHT I WAS FREE OF YOUR GRASP AND THEN YOU COME BACK HERE.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HEY DWEEB, LOOK OVER THERE! I THINK IT'S... PEOPLE?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HEY MEATBAG, DON'T YOU THINK YOU'RE A LITTLE FAT FOR THAT THING? WAIT, YOU'RE SERIOUS? STO-AAAHHH!!!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HUH, THIS VIEW IS GOOD. PSST... I DON'T WANT TO ACKNOWLEDGE THE FACT THAT WE'RE STANDING ON A CLOUD IN FEAR OF IT FALLING APART LIKE SOME CLICHÉ... GOOOOOD VIEW.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: I BET THE PERSON WHO LIVES HERE DIDN'T EVEN COME UP WITH THIS ROBOT. IT'S TOO GOOD TO BE ORIGINAL.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HEY IDIOT, WHERE ARE WE THIS TIME! IT FEELS ALL... BRIGHT, ALMOST EXCESSIVELY SO-

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: YOU KNOW, HAVE I EVER TOLD YOU JUST HOW MUCH I HA-

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: SATISFIED YET? CAN YOU TRY UNHINGING HIS JAW AND PUTTING YOUR ARM IN THERE?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HEY IDIOT, WHERE ARE WE?? THIS PLACE SMELLS LIKE-

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOW. NOW THAT IS A BIG GUY. IT LOOKS ANCIENT! I WONDER WHO COULD'VE BUILT SOMETHING LIKE THIS...

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ... WOW. I'M SPEECHLESS. HUMAN, ARE YOU SEEING THIS PLACE? WITH THE NUMBER OF EMERALDS HERE... WE'RE GONNA BE RICH!!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: GREAT JOB! YOU SOMEHOW MANAGED TO FALL OUT OF REALITY BY DOING ABSOLUTELY NOTHING!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ALRIGHT, HOLD UP, LET ME GET SOMETHING STRAIGHT HERE. YOU ACTUALLY THINK IT'S A GOOD IDEA TO GO INSIDE THAT OMINOUS DOME THAT'S LITERALLY ERUPTING WITH THIS HORRIBLE DARK SENSATION FOR... WHAT REASON??.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: OH. OH, I DON'T- I DON'T LIKE THIS PLACE. AT ALL. WH-WHERE ARE WE??

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOAH, HEY, WH-WHAT ARE WE DOING HERE, HUMAN?? IT'S... IT'S PROBABLY DANGEROUS IN THERE! Y-YOU WOULDN'T WANT TO DIE, WOULD YOU???

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOW, LOTS OF POWERFUL MAGIC HERE, HUH?? MUCH STRONGER THAN ANYTHING YOU COULD EVER DO, THAT'S FOR SURE!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: OH, LOOK AT THESE THINGS. THEY'RE KIND OF CUTE. A LITTLE BIT TOO CUTE... IT'S A CONSPIRACY, I TELL YOU!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: I KNEW IT! IT'S ALL A CONSPIRACY!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: THIS BRIDGE SEEMS DIFFERENT SINCE YOU LAST CROSSED IT, OR IS IT JUST ME? IT MIGHT JUST BE YOUR 247TH TIME CROSSING IT THAT'S DISORIENTATING ME... OR DID I LOSE COUNT AGAIN?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOAH, WAIT. WHERE ARE WE? WHAT ARE YOU DOING HE-

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ...I DON'T KNOW WHAT MANIC IDEA YOU'RE ABOUT TO HAVE NOW, BUT I'M GOING TO PUT AN END TO IT RIGHT NOW. YOU DO NOT WANT TO GO IN THERE.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: REALLY COOL CITY, HUH? BUILT UP ON THE CLIFFS, VERY STYLISH, IS THAT WHAT YOU'RE THINKING?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: "WOW, WHAT EVEN IS THIS PLACE?? FEELS OMINOUS, LOOKS LAME, WHAT ARE WE DOING HERE? DROP ME OFF SOMEPLACE ELSE!"

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOW, GET A LOAD OF THIS PLACE! VERY FANCY. I'M SURE WHATEVER IT IS, IT'S PROBABLY VERY IMPORTANT!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ...ALRIGHT. I'VE ACCEPTED THAT YOU GO TO WEIRD PLACES, BUT THIS CROSSES THE LINE. WHERE THE BLOODY HELL ARE WE?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HEY, HUMAN, TAKE A LOOK!! YOU CAN SEE THE WHOLE LIGHT REALM FROM UP HERE!!!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOW, WOW! I CAN'T BELIEVE THIS! THIS SLEAZY POTION MERCHANT CAN JUST HAVE A SECRET CRATE OF MUSHROOMS THAT HE'S PROBABLY TRAFFICKING ILLEGALLY, AND NOBODY BATS AN EYE...

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOAH, HEY, WAIT, WHAT ARE WE DOING HERE?? HUMAN, I'VE BEEN PERMANENTLY EXILED FROM THIS PLACE EVER SINCE I SET UP THAT MUSHROOM SHOP HERE FIVE YEARS AGO!!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: LOOK AT THIS! WHAT DO YOU MEAN WHAT?! OPEN YOUR EYES! WE'RE RICH! MODESTY CAN GO IN THE TRASH, HUMAN.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: YOU KNOW, THIS PLACE IS NICE. MUCH BETTER THAN ALL THE OTHER PLACES YOU GO TO.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WHAT IS THIS PLACE? IT SMELLS LIKE DUST ... AND SAND. WEIRD.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: OH, I'VE HEARD OF THIS PLACE!! THERE'S SOME CRAZY STRONG MECHS IN THERE, RIGHT?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOW... THIS PLACE LOOKS... NICE, ACTUALLY. IT LOOKS NICE! YOU KNOW, I THINK DESPITE THE HORRORS WE'VE GONE THROUGH TO GET HERE, I'M GLAD WE CAME HERE.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: SO, I'VE BEEN WONDERING, DO YOU OFTEN MAKE A HABIT OF GOING PLACES WHERE YOU SHOULDN'T BE GOING?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOW, GET A LOAD OF THIS GUY! HE LOOKS DUMBER THAN YOU DO, HUMAN!! A LITTLE FAMILIAR, ACTUALLY... SORT OF LIKE-

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOAH, WHAT THE HELL WAS THAT! THIS IS SOMEONE'S PRIVATE PROPERTY, YOU CAN'T JUST GO AROUND RANDOMLY BREAKING PEOPLE'S WINDOWS!!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WAIT, I HEAR SOMETHING SQUEAKI- HEY, LOOK! THERE'S A RAT!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WAIT- IT'S RUNNING AWAY! FOLLOW IT!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WHA-... DID WE JUST WATCH A RAT... KILL ITSELF? WHAT THE HELL!?!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ... HEY, HUMAN, TELL ME SOMETHING. WHY ARE YOU OUT HERE AND NOT IN ONE OF THOSE CELLS?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: PLEASE. LISTEN TO ME FOR ONE MOMENT. IF YOU GO ANYWHERE NEAR THAT... THING... WE ARE GOING TO DIE. PLEASE. GO BACK.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: YOU KNOW, IT REALLY ASTONISHES ME, THE KINDS OF PLACES YOU GET TO.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: LIKE, WHAT EVEN IS THIS PLACE? WHERE ARE WE? WHY IS THIS HERE??

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: THE ANSWERS TO THOSE QUESTIONS, IN ORDER, ARE WHO KNOWS, WHO KNOWS, AND WHO KNOWS?!?!?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ...AND I HAD THOUGHT SOME OF YOUR PREVIOUS LOONEY ADVENTURES HAD INDICATED YOU WERE A BUMBLING IDIOT, BUT YOU'VE REALLY OUTDONE YOURSELF... WHERE EVEN ARE WE?!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: KNOWING YOUR ADVENTURING TRACK RECORD, IT LEADS ME TO BELIEVE IT'S BEST TO AVOID THIS PLACE, UNLESS YOU'RE LOOKING FOR SOME DUMB SECRET THAT NO ONE CARES ABOUT.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: DO I HAVE ANY SECRETS YOU ASK? WELL THE KEY TO SUCCESS IS TO HIDE AND LOCK AWAY YOUR SECRETS AND TO NEVER TELL THEM TO ANYONE. YOU DON'T COUNT AS ANYONE. YOU'RE TOO DUMB FOR THAT.

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: ON A SIDE NOTE, I'VE ALWAYS THOUGHT ABOUT SOMETHING... WHAT COMPELS YOU TO BE AN ADVENTURER AND EXPLORE THE WORLD? FIRST YOU BRING ME HERE, BUT WHAT NEXT? THE MIDDLE OF NOWHERE?!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: HEY, LOOK, FINALLY, NORMAL PEOPLE! JUST LEAVE ME HERE, LITERALLY ANYBODY WOULD BE BETTER THAN YOU!!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WHAT? WHAT DO YOU MEAN THEY'RE NOT HUMANS? THEY LOOK HUMAN TO ME!!! OH, SO WHAT, ANYBODY WHO'S DIFFERENT FROM YOU IS SUDDENLY 'NOT HUMAN???'

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: WOW! AND HERE I WAS THINKING YOU COULDN'T GET ANY WORSE! LET'S JUST GET OUT OF HERE BEFORE THEY HEAR YOU AND START TO TURN ON YOU!!

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: PSST, HEY IDIOT. DOESN'T THIS PLACE REMIND YOU OF THAT MASSIVE TOWER WITH THE BIG EYE ON IT? YOU KNOW, IN THAT... PLACE?

lines.speaker: Talking Mushroom
lines.line: NOW THAT I THINK OF IT, MOST OF THE STRUCTURES WE COME ACROSS LOOK LIKE THAT TOWE-

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Nemract, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Rooster Island, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Bear Zoo Island, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Durum Isles, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Selchar, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Half Moon Island, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Mage Island, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Llevigar, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Ice Nations, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Nesaak, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Skiens Island, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Volcanic Isles, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Zhight Island, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Maro Peaks, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Galleon's Graveyard, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Pirate Cove, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Dead Island, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Where are ya headed? Jofash Docks, huh? A'ight! I'll get ya there in no time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: So, this is your first time ridin' the ol' Seaskipper, eh? It's okay if you're a wee bit seasick.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Did I ever tell you about how I fended off an entire pirate ship?

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: I've heard tales around Nemract's Bar, about one of the greatest treasure hunts of all time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Seems like it's a long travel ahead. How about some fishin’ to kill time, hm? Never done it?

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Sometimes, no matter where I am, I'll hear someone shoutin’ like they're right next to me.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: I've been sailin' for years, I know every island in the sea like the back of my hand.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: You'll never believe what I salvaged earlier today.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Tomatoes, check... Carrots, check... Did that box jus' move?

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Did I ever tell you the story about how I got into the Seaskipper business in the first place?

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: I just got back from a trip to Nemract, and I gotta tell ya all about this crazy story I 'eard.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Some people really don't like waitin' through these trips. I try and tell stories to pass the time.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: One of my ol' mates in Selchar buys valuable ocean treasures. You could make a lot of emeralds off of 'im.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Ah, sorry 'bout the mess here! I don't get many clients, so keeping the ship clean isn't what I do.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Y'know, I rarely get a client who talks to me.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Did you ever 'ear about the Bear Zoo on that island? Almost no one has!

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Fetch me some Nemract Whiskey, my throat is sore from all this talking and this accursed hot weather... hic!

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Corkus is one of the most interestin' places I've ever sailed to. All those crazy machines are incredible...

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Y'know, there's a sailor tale of a ghost ship swimmin' around the ocean. Many say it's fake, but I've seen with my own eyes!

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: I've 'ad the Ice Islands on my brain for a while now. I'll tell you all about them.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Y'know, you look like someone who'd use my service more than once.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Hey, have you heard about Gavel's legendary hero, Siegfried?

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: You know, I'm surprised I've found someone willin' to listen to all of my stories.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: Have you ev'r heard the tale of the Troll Tower? It rests upon a small island, in a part of the sea where few travel.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: I've had a lot of passengers with a few screws loose, and today I'll tell ye the tale of the craziest of 'em all.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: You ever heard of Sarnfic? It's an old, sunken city in the  ocean.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: The locals over at Jofash are weird. One time I met a crazy captain who only spoke in rhymes.

lines.speaker: Seaskipper Captain
lines.line: There's a lot of stories about a mysterious island, called Gateway Island.
